[03] 797^b^.^eb^ anāpatti palaṇḍuke, bhañjanake, harītake, cāpalasuṇe, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, sāḷave, uttaribhaṅge, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 798^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0097^ea^ ^a^M0.0341^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpetvā aciravatiyā nadiyā vesiyāhi saddhiṃ naggā ekatitthe ^a^P4.0260^ea^ nahāyanti. vesiyā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tāsaṃ vesiyānaṃ ujjhāyantīnaṃ khiyyantīnaṃ vipācentīnaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 799^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 800^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^sambādho^eb^ nāma ubho upakacchakā, muttakaraṇaṃ.
[03]^b^saṃharāpeyyā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0355^ea^ ekampi lomaṃ saṃharāpeti, āpatti ^a^T0.0098^ea^ pācittiyassa. bahukepi lome saṃharāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 801^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ābādhapaccayā, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 802^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuniyo anabhiratiyā ^a^M0.0342^ea^ pīḷitā ovarakaṃ pavisitvā talaghātakaṃ karonti. bhikkhuniyo tena saddena upadhāvitvā tā bhikkhuniyo etadavocuṃ -- ``kissa tumhe, ayye, purisena saddhiṃ sampadussathā''ti? ``na mayaṃ, ayye, purisena saddhiṃ sampadussāmā''ti. bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo talaghātakaṃ karissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo talaghātakaṃ karontīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo talaghātakaṃ karissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 803^b^.^eb^ ^b^``talaghātake pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 804^b^.^eb^ ^b^talaghātakaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0099^ea^ ^a^P4.0261^ea^ nāma samphassaṃ sādiyantī antamaso uppalapattenapi muttakaraṇe pahāraṃ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 805^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ābādhapaccayā, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] tatiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 806^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0356^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarā purāṇarājorodhā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā {aññataro purāṇarājorodho bhikkhunīsu pabbajito (syā0)} hoti. aññatarā bhikkhunī anabhiratiyā pīḷitā yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca -- ``rājā kho, ayye, tumhe cirāciraṃ gacchati. kathaṃ tumhe dhārethā''ti? ``jatumaṭṭhakena, ayye''ti. ``kiṃ etaṃ, ayye, jatumaṭṭhaka''nti? atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassā bhikkhuniyā jatumaṭṭhakaṃ ācikkhi. atha kho sā bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakaṃ ādiyitvā dhovituṃ vissaritvā ekamantaṃ chaḍḍesi. bhikkhuniyo makkhikāhi samparikiṇṇaṃ passitvā ^a^M0.0343^ea^ evamāhaṃsu -- ``kassidaṃ kamma''nti? sā evamāha -- ``mayhidaṃ kamma''nti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakaṃ ādiyissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakaṃ ādiyatīti {ādiyīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi ^a^T0.0100^ea^ buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakaṃ ādiyissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 807^b^.^eb^ ^b^``jatumaṭṭhake^eb^ {jatumaṭṭake (sī0)} ^b^pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 808^b^.^eb^ ^b^jatumaṭṭhakaṃ^eb^ nāma jatumayaṃ kaṭṭhamayaṃ piṭṭhamayaṃ mattikāmayaṃ.
[03]^b^ādiyeyyā^eb^ti samphassaṃ sādiyantī antamaso uppalapattampi muttakaraṇaṃ paveseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 809^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ābādhapaccayā, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] catutthasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 810^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0262^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme. atha ^a^V0.0357^ea^ kho mahāpajāpati gotamī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā adhovāte aṭṭhāsi -- ``duggandho, bhagavā, mātugāmo''ti. atha kho bhagavā -- ``ādiyantu kho bhikkhuniyo udakasuddhika''nti, mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi. atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi ^a^T0.0101^ea^ -- ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṃ udakasuddhika''nti. tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī -- ``bhagavatā ^a^M0.0344^ea^ udakasuddhikā anuññātā''ti atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyantī muttakaraṇe vaṇaṃ akāsi. atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ āroceti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyissatīti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyatī''ti {ādiyīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 811^b^.^eb^ ^b^``udakasuddhikaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā ādiyamānāya dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabbaṃ. taṃ atikkāmentiyā pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 812^b^.^eb^ ^b^udakasuddhikaṃ^eb^ nāma muttakaraṇassa dhovanā vuccati.
[03]^b^ādiyamānāyā^eb^ti dhovantiyā.
[03]^b^dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabba^eb^nti dvīsu aṅgulesu dve pabbaparamā ādātabbā.
[03]^b^taṃ atikkāmentiyā^eb^ti samphassaṃ sādiyantī antamaso kesaggamattampi atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 813^b^.^eb^ atirekadvaṅgulapabbe atirekasaññā ādiyati, āpatti pācittiyassa. atirekadvaṅgulapabbe ^a^V0.0358^ea^ vematikā ādiyati, āpatti pācittiyassa ^a^T0.0102^ea^. atirekadvaṅgulapabbe ūnakasaññā ādiyati, āpatti pācittiyassa ^a^P4.0263^ea^.
[03]ūnakadvaṅgulapabbe atirekasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ūnakadvaṅgulapabbe vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ūnakadvaṅgulapabbe ūnakasaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 814^b^.^eb^ anāpatti dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādiyati, ūnakadvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādiyati, ābādhapaccayā, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] pañcamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 815^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0345^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena ārohanto nāma mahāmatto bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti. tassa purāṇadutiyikā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā hoti. tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu tassā bhikkhuniyā santike bhattavissaggaṃ karoti. atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassa bhikkhuno bhuñjantassa pānīyena ca vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhitvā accāvadati. atha kho so bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apasādeti -- ``mā, bhagini, evarūpaṃ akāsi. netaṃ kappatī''ti. ``pubbe maṃ tvaṃ evañca evañca karosi, idāni ettakaṃ na sahasī''ti -- pānīyathālakaṃ matthake āsumbhitvā vidhūpanena pahāraṃ adāsi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi ^a^T0.0103^ea^ nāma bhikkhunī bhikkhussa pahāraṃ dassatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī bhikkhussa pahāraṃ adāsīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī bhikkhussa pahāraṃ dassati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 816^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 817^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0359^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^bhikkhussā^eb^ti upasampannassa.
[03]^b^bhuñjantassā^eb^ti pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjantassa.
[03]^b^pānīyaṃ^eb^ nāma yaṃ kiñci pānīyaṃ.
[03]^b^vidhūpanaṃ^eb^ nāma yā kāci bījanī.
[03]^b^upatiṭṭheyyā^eb^ti hatthapāse tiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 818^b^.^eb^ upasampanne ^a^P4.0264^ea^ upasampannasaññā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampanne vematikā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampanne anupasampannasaññā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03]hatthapāsaṃ ^a^M0.0346^ea^ vijahitvā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. khādanīyaṃ khādantassa upatiṭṭhati, āpatti ^a^T0.0104^ea^ dukkaṭassa. anupasampannassa upatiṭṭhati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampanne upasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampanne vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampanne anupasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 819^b^.^eb^ anāpatti deti, dāpeti, anupasampannaṃ āṇāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] chaṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 820^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0360^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo sassakāle āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpetvā nagaraṃ atiharanti dvāraṭṭhāne -- ``dethāyye, bhāga''nti. palibundhetvā muñciṃsu. atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo upassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --

[03] 821^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī āmakadhaññaṃ viññatvā vā viññāpetvā ^a^T0.0105^ea^ vā bhajjitvā vā bhajjāpetvā vā koṭṭetvā vā koṭṭāpetvā vā pacitvā vā pacāpetvā vā bhuñjeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 822^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^āmakadhaññaṃ^eb^ nāma sāli vīhi yavo godhumo kaṅgu varako kudrusako.
[03]^b^viññatvā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0347^ea^ sayaṃ viññatvā. ^b^viññāpetvā^eb^ti aññaṃ viññāpetvā.
[03]^b^bhajjitvā^eb^ti sayaṃ bhajjitvā. ^b^bhajjāpetvā^eb^ti aññaṃ bhajjāpetvā.
[03]^b^koṭṭetvā^eb^ti sayaṃ koṭṭetvā. ^b^koṭṭāpetvā^eb^ti aññaṃ koṭṭāpetvā.
[03]^b^pacitvā^eb^ti sayaṃ pacitvā. ^b^pacāpetvā^eb^ti aññaṃ pacāpetvā.
[03]``bhuñjissāmī''ti ^a^V0.0361^ea^ paṭiggaṇhāti ^a^P4.0265^ea^, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 823^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ābādhapaccayā, aparaṇṇaṃ viññāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] sattamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 824^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññataro brāhmaṇo nibbiṭṭharājabhaṭo ``taññeva bhaṭapathaṃ yācissāmī''ti sīsaṃ nahāyitvā ^a^T0.0106^ea^ bhikkhunupassayaṃ nissāya rājakulaṃ gacchati. aññatarā bhikkhunī kaṭāhe vaccaṃ katvā tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍentī tassa brāhmaṇassa matthake āsumbhi. atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti -- ``assamaṇiyo imā muṇḍā bandhakiniyo. kathañhi nāma gūthakaṭāhaṃ matthake āsumbhissanti! imāsaṃ upassayaṃ jhāpessāmī''ti! ummukaṃ gahetvā upassayaṃ pavisati. aññataro upāsako upassayā nikkhamanto addasa taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ummukaṃ gahetvā upassayaṃ pavisantaṃ. disvāna taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca -- ``kissa tvaṃ, bho, ummukaṃ gahetvā upassayaṃ pavisasī''ti? ``imā maṃ, bho, muṇḍā bandhakiniyo gūthakaṭāhaṃ matthake āsumbhiṃsu. imāsaṃ upassayaṃ jhāpessāmī''ti. ``gaccha, bho brāhmaṇa, maṅgalaṃ etaṃ. sahassaṃ lacchasi tañca bhaṭapatha''nti. atha kho so brāhmaṇo sīsaṃ nahāyitvā rājakulaṃ gantvā sahassaṃ alattha tañca bhaṭapathaṃ. atha kho so upāsako upassayaṃ pavisitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ^a^M0.0348^ea^ ārocetvā paribhāsi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave ^a^T0.0107^ea^, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 825^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0362^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vā chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 826^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^P4.0266^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^uccāro^eb^ nāma gūtho vuccati. ^b^passāvo^eb^ nāma muttaṃ vuccati.
[03]^b^saṅkāraṃ^eb^ nāma kacavaraṃ vuccati.
[03]^b^vighāsaṃ^eb^ nāma calakāni vā aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ vā.
[03]^b^kuṭṭo^eb^ nāma tayo kuṭṭā -- iṭṭhakākuṭṭo, silākuṭṭo, dārukuṭṭo.
[03]^b^pākāro^eb^ nāma tayo pākārā -- iṭṭhakāpākāro, silāpākāro, dārupākāro.
[03]^b^tirokuṭṭe^eb^ti kuṭṭassa parato. ^b^tiropākāre^eb^ti pākārassa parato.
[03]^b^chaḍḍeyyā^eb^ti sayaṃ chaḍḍeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]^b^chaḍḍāpeyyā^eb^ti aññaṃ āṇāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. sakiṃ āṇattā bahukampi chaḍḍeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 827^b^.^eb^ anāpatti oloketvā chaḍḍeti, avaḷañje chaḍḍeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] aṭṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 828^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0349^ea^ ^a^V0.0363^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ^a^T0.0108^ea^ ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa bhikkhunūpassayaṃ nissāya yavakhettaṃ hoti. bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi khette chaḍḍenti. atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo amhākaṃ yavakhettaṃ dūsessantī''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 829^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā harite chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.

[03] 853^b^.^eb^ anāpatti yo koci viññū dutiyo hoti, arahopekkhā, aññavihitā santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā, na anācāraṃ ācaritukāmā, sati karaṇīye dutiyikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ uyyojeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] catutthasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 854^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0357^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī aññatarassa kulassa kulūpikā hoti niccabhattikā. atha kho sā bhikkhunī pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena taṃ kulaṃ ^a^V0.0372^ea^ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkāmi. tassa kulassa dāsī gharaṃ sammajjantī taṃ ^a^P4.0272^ea^ āsanaṃ bhājanantarikāya pakkhipi. manussā taṃ āsanaṃ apassantā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavocuṃ ^a^T0.0119^ea^ -- ``kahaṃ taṃ, ayye, āsana''nti? ``nāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso, āsanaṃ passāmī''ti. ``dethāyye, taṃ āsana''nti paribhāsitvā niccabhattaṃ pacchindiṃsu. atha kho te manussā gharaṃ sodhentā taṃ āsanaṃ bhājanantarikāya passitvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ khamāpetvā niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ. atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamatīti {pakkamīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave bhikkhunī purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 855^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkameyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 856^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^purebhattaṃ^eb^ nāma aruṇuggamanaṃ upādāya yāva majjhanhikā.
[03]^b^kulaṃ^eb^ nāma cattāri kulāni -- khattiyakulaṃ, brāhmaṇakulaṃ, vessakulaṃ, suddakulaṃ. ^b^upasaṅkamitvā^eb^ti tattha gantvā.
[03]^b^āsanaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0120^ea^ ^a^M0.0358^ea^ ^b^nāma pallaṅkassa okāso vuccati. ^b^nisīditvā^eb^ti tasmiṃ nisīditvā.
[03]^b^sāmike anāpucchā pakkameyyā^eb^ti yo tasmiṃ kule manusso viññū taṃ anāpucchā anovassakaṃ ^a^V0.0373^ea^ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa. ajjhokāse upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 857^b^.^eb^ anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā pakkamati, āpatti pācittiyassa. anāpucchite vematikā pakkamati, āpatti pācittiyassa. anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā pakkamati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]pallaṅkassa anokāse āpatti dukkaṭassa. āpucchite anāpucchitasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. āpucchite vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. āpucchite āpucchitasaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 858^b^.^eb^ anāpatti āpucchā gacchati, asaṃhārime, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] pañcamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 859^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0273^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdatipi ^a^T0.0121^ea^ abhinipajjatipi. manussā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ hirīyamānā āsane neva abhinisīdanti na abhinipajjanti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdissatipi abhinipajjissatipī''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā pacchābhattaṃ kulāni ^a^M0.0359^ea^ upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdissatipi abhinipajjissatipī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdatipi abhinipajjatipīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave ^a^V0.0374^ea^, thullanandā bhikkhunī pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdissatipi abhinipajjissatipi! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 860^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 861^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^pacchābhattaṃ^eb^ nāma majjhanhike vītivatte yāva atthaṅgate sūriye.
[03]^b^kulaṃ^eb^ nāma cattāri kulāni ^a^T0.0122^ea^ -- khattiyakulaṃ, brāhmaṇakulaṃ, vessakulaṃ, suddakulaṃ. ^b^upasaṅkamitvā^eb^ti tattha gantvā.
[03]^b^sāmike anāpucchā^eb^ti yo tasmiṃ kule manusso sāmiko dātuṃ, taṃ anāpucchā.
[03]^b^āsanaṃ^eb^ nāma pallaṅkassa okāso vuccati.
[03]^b^abhinisīdeyyā^eb^ti tasmiṃ abhinisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]^b^abhinipajjeyyā^eb^ti tasmiṃ abhinipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 862^b^.^eb^ anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. anāpucchite vematikā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]pallaṅkassa ^a^M0.0360^ea^ anokāse āpatti dukkaṭassa. āpucchite anāpucchitasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa ^a^V0.0375^ea^. āpucchite vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. āpucchite āpucchitasaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 863^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^P4.0274^ea^ āpucchā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, dhuvapaññatte, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] chaṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 864^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ^a^T0.0123^ea^ ārāme. tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchantiyo sāyaṃ aññataraṃ gāmaṃ upagantvā aññataraṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ upasaṅkamitvā okāsaṃ yāciṃsu. atha kho sā brāhmaṇī tā bhikkhuniyo etadavoca -- ``āgametha, ayye, yāva brāhmaṇo āgacchatī''ti. bhikkhuniyo -- ``yāva brāhmaṇo āgacchatī''ti seyyaṃ santharitvā ekaccā nisīdiṃsu ekaccā nipajjiṃsu. atha kho so brāhmaṇo rattiṃ āgantvā taṃ brāhmaṇiṃ etadavoca -- ``kā imā''ti? ``bhikkhuniyo, ayyā''ti. ``nikkaḍḍhatha imā muṇḍā bandhakiniyo''ti, gharato nikkaḍḍhāpesi. atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā abhinisīdissantipi abhinipajjissantipī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā abhinisīdantipi abhinipajjantipīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā abhinisīdissantipi abhinipajjissantipi! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ^a^T0.0124^ea^ imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --

[03] 865^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^M0.0361^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 866^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0376^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^vikālo^eb^ nāma atthaṅgate sūriye yāva aruṇuggamanā.
[03]^b^kulaṃ^eb^ nāma cattāri kulāni -- khattiyakulaṃ, brāhmaṇakulaṃ, vessakulaṃ suddakulaṃ. ^b^upasaṅkamitvā^eb^ti tattha gantvā.
[03]^b^sāmike anāpucchā^eb^ti yo tasmiṃ kule manusso sāmiko dātuṃ, taṃ anāpucchā.

[03]^b^seyyaṃ^eb^ nāma antamaso paṇṇasanthāropi. ^b^santharitvā^eb^ti sayaṃ santharitvā. ^b^santharāpetvā^eb^ti ^a^P4.0275^ea^ aññaṃ santharāpetvā. ^b^abhinisīdeyyā^eb^ti tasmiṃ abhinisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa. ^b^abhinipajjeyyā^eb^ti tasmiṃ abhinipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 867^b^.^eb^ anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. anāpucchite vematikā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]āpucchite anāpucchitasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. āpucchite vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. āpucchite āpucchitasaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 868^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^T0.0125^ea^ āpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] sattamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 869^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0362^ea^ ^a^V0.0377^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhaddāya kāpilāniyā antevāsinī bhikkhunī bhaddaṃ kāpilāniṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭheti. bhaddā kāpilānī bhikkhuniyo etadavoca -- ``ayaṃ maṃ, ayye, bhikkhunī sakkacaṃ upaṭṭheti, imissāhaṃ cīvaraṃ dassāmī''ti. atha kho sā bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpesi -- ``ahaṃ kirāyye, ayyaṃ na sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhemi, na kira me ayyā cīvaraṃ dassatī''ti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpessatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpetīti {ujjhāpesīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpessati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 870^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 871^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^T0.0126^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^duggahitenā^eb^ti aññathā gahitena {uggahitena (ka0)}.
[03]^b^dūpadhāritenā^eb^ti aññathā upadhāritena.
[03]^b^para^eb^nti upasampannaṃ ujjhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 872^b^.^eb^ upasampannāya ^a^P4.0276^ea^ upasampannasaññā ujjhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya vematikā ujjhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā ujjhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03]anupasampannaṃ ^a^M0.0363^ea^ ujjhāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya upasampannasaññā, āpatti ^a^V0.0378^ea^ dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya anupasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 873^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] aṭṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 874^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo attano bhaṇḍakaṃ apassantiyo caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavocuṃ -- ``apāyye, amhākaṃ, bhaṇḍakaṃ passeyyāsī''ti? caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti -- ``ahameva nūna corī, ahameva nūna ^a^T0.0127^ea^ alajjinī, yā ayyāyo attano bhaṇḍakaṃ apassantiyo tā maṃ evamāhaṃsu -- `apāyye, amhākaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ passeyyāsī'ti? sacāhaṃ, ayye, tumhākaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ gaṇhāmi, assamaṇī homi, brahmacariyā cavāmi, nirayaṃ upapajjāmi; yā pana maṃ abhūtena evamāha sāpi assamaṇī hotu, brahmacariyā cavatu, nirayaṃ upapajjatū''ti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapatīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 875^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapeyya, pācittiyya''^eb^nti.
[03] 876^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^attāna^eb^nti ^a^M0.0364^ea^ ^a^V0.0379^ea^ paccattaṃ. ^b^para^eb^nti upasampannaṃ. nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 877^b^.^eb^ upasampannāya ^a^P4.0277^ea^ upasampannasaññā nirayena vā brahmacariyena ^a^T0.0128^ea^ vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya vematikā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03]tiracchānayoniyā vā pettivisayena vā manussadobhaggena vā abhisapati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannaṃ abhisapati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya upasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya anupasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 878^b^.^eb^ anāpatti atthapurekkhārāya, dhammapurekkhārāya, anusāsanipurekkhārāya, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] navamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 879^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodati. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodatīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... ^a^T0.0129^ea^ kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 880^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^M0.0365^ea^ ^a^V0.0380^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 881^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^attāna^eb^nti paccattaṃ. vadhitvā vadhitvā rodati, āpatti pācittiyassa. vadhati na rodati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. rodati na vadhati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 882^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ñātibyasanena vā bhogabyasanena vā rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhā rodati na vadhati, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[06] andhakāravaggo dutiyo.

[03] 883^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0278^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena sambahulā {mahāva0 350} bhikkhuniyo aciravatiyā nadiyā vesiyāhi saddhiṃ naggā ekatitthe nahāyanti. vesiyā tā bhikkhuniyo uppaṇḍesuṃ -- ``kiṃ nu kho nāma tumhākaṃ, ayye, daharānaṃ {daharānaṃ daharānaṃ (sī0)} brahmacariyaṃ ciṇṇena, nanu nāma kāmā paribhuñjitabbā ^a^T0.0130^ea^! yadā jiṇṇā bhavissatha tadā brahmacariyaṃ carissatha. evaṃ tumhākaṃ ubho atthā pariggahitā bhavissantī''ti. bhikkhuniyo vesiyāhi uppaṇḍiyamānā maṅkū ahesuṃ. atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo upassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ ^a^V0.0381^ea^ paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca -- saṅghasuṭṭhutāya...pe0... vinayānuggahāya. evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 884^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^M0.0366^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī naggā nahāyeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.

[03] 887^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ {mahāva0 351} udakasāṭikā ^a^T0.0131^ea^ anuññātā hoti ^a^P4.0279^ea^. chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo -- ``bhagavatā udakasāṭikā anuññātā''ti appamāṇikāyo udakasāṭikāyo dhāresuṃ {dhārenti (pāci0 531-545)}. puratopi pacchatopi ākaḍḍhantā āhiṇḍanti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo appamāṇikāyo udakasāṭikāyo dhāressantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo appamāṇikāyo udakasāṭikāyo dhārentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo appamāṇikāyo udakasāṭikāyo dhāressanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --

[03] 889^b^.^eb^ ^b^udakasāṭikā^eb^ ^a^M0.0367^ea^ nāma yāya nivatthā {nivatthāya (syā0)} nahāyati.

[03] 890^b^.^eb^ attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa ^a^T0.0132^ea^. attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 891^b^.^eb^ anāpatti pamāṇikaṃ karoti, ūnakaṃ karoti, aññena kataṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ paṭilabhitvā chinditvā paribhuñjati, vitānaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā sāṇipākāraṃ vā bhisiṃ vā bibbohanaṃ vā karoti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.

[03] 892^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā mahagghe cīvaradusse cīvaraṃ dukkaṭaṃ hoti dussibbitaṃ. thullanandā bhikkhunī ^a^P4.0280^ea^ taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca -- ``sundaraṃ kho idaṃ ^a^V0.0383^ea^ te, ayye, cīvaradussaṃ; cīvarañca kho dukkaṭaṃ dussibbita''nti. ``visibbemi, ayye, sibbissasī''ti? ``āmāyye, sibbissāmī''ti. atha kho sā bhikkhunī taṃ cīvaraṃ visibbetvā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā ^a^M0.0368^ea^ adāsi. thullanandā bhikkhunī -- ``sibbissāmi sibbissāmī''ti neva sibbati na sibbāpanāya ^a^T0.0133^ea^ ussukkaṃ karoti. atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbāpetvā neva sibbissati na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbāpetvā neva sibbati na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karotīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbāpetvā neva sibbissati na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --

[03] 893^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva sibbeyya na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, aññatra catūhapañcāhā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 894^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^bhikkhuniyā^eb^ti aññāya bhikkhuniyā.
[03]^b^cīvaraṃ^eb^ nāma channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ.
[03]^b^visibbetvā^eb^ti sayaṃ visibbetvā. ^b^visibbāpetvā^eb^ti aññaṃ visibbāpetvā.
[03]^b^sā pacchā anantarāyikinī^eb^ti asati antarāye.
[03]^b^neva sibbeyyā^eb^ti na sayaṃ sibbeyya. ^b^na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyyā^eb^ti na aññaṃ āṇāpeyya.
[03]^b^aññatra^eb^ ^a^V0.0384^ea^ ^b^catūhapañcāhā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā ^a^T0.0134^ea^ catūhapañcāhaṃ. ``neva sibbissāmi na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī''ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 895^b^.^eb^ upasampannāya upasampannasaññā cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva sibbati na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti, aññatra catūhapañcāhā, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya vematikā ^a^M0.0369^ea^ cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva sibbati na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti, aññatra catūhapañcāhā, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva sibbati na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti, aññatra catūhapañcāhā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03]aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva sibbati na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti, aññatra catūhapañcāhā, āpatti dukkaṭassa ^a^P4.0281^ea^. anupasampannāya cīvaraṃ vā aññaṃ vā parikkhāraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva sibbati na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti, aññatra catūhapañcāhā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya upasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya anupasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] 908^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 909^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03] 925^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0145^ea^ ^a^M0.0377^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena saṅghaṃ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti. so tassa vihārassa mahe ubhatosaṅghassa akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmo hoti. tena kho pana samayena ubhatosaṅghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ hoti. atha kho so upāsako saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṃ yāci. bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi -- ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kathinaṃ uddharituṃ. evañca pana bhikkhave kathinaṃ uddharitabbaṃ. byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo --
