[03] 941^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0150^ea^ ^a^P4.0290^ea^ ^a^M0.0381^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī bahussutā hoti bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kātuṃ. bhaddāpi kāpilānī bahussutā hoti bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā ^a^V0.0396^ea^ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kātuṃ uḷārasambhāvitā. manussā -- ``ayyā bhaddā kāpilānī bahussutā bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kātuṃ uḷārasambhāvitā''ti bhaddaṃ kāpilāniṃ paṭhamaṃ payirupāsitvā, pacchā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ payirupāsanti. thullanandā bhikkhunī issāpakatā -- ``imā kira appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā yā imā saññattibahulā viññattibahulā viharantī''ti bhaddāya kāpilāniyā purato caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti uddisatipi uddisāpetipi sajjhāyampi karoti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā ayyāya bhaddāya kāpilāniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ karissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhaddāya kāpilāniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ karotīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhaddāya kāpilāniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ karissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... ^a^T0.0151^ea^ evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 942^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ kareyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 943^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^bhikkhuniyā^eb^ti aññāya bhikkhuniyā.
[03]^b^sañciccā^eb^ti jānantī sañjānantī cecca abhivitaritvā vītikkamo.

[03]^b^aphāsuṃ kareyyā^eb^ti -- ``iminā imissā aphāsu bhavissatī''ti anāpucchā purato caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti uddisati vā uddisāpeti vā sajjhāyaṃ vā karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 944^b^.^eb^ upasampannāya ^a^P4.0291^ea^ ^a^M0.0382^ea^ upasampannasaññā sañcicca aphāsuṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya vematikā sañcicca aphāsuṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā sañcicca aphāsuṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03]anupasampannāya ^a^V0.0397^ea^ sañcicca aphāsuṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya upasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya anupasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 945^b^.^eb^ anāpatti na aphāsuṃ kattukāmā āpucchā purato caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti uddisati vā uddisāpeti vā sajjhāyaṃ vā karoti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] tatiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 946^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0152^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭheti na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhessati na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭheti na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karotīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhessati na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 947^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭheyya na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 948^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^M0.0383^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^dukkhitā^eb^ nāma gilānā vuccati.
[03]^b^sahajīvinī^eb^ ^a^V0.0398^ea^ nāma saddhivihārinī vuccati.
[03]^b^neva upaṭṭheyyā^eb^ti na sayaṃ upaṭṭheyya.
[03]^b^na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyyā^eb^ti na aññaṃ āṇāpeyya ^a^T0.0153^ea^.

[03]``neva upaṭṭhessāmi, na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī''ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa. antevāsiniṃ vā anupasampannaṃ vā neva upaṭṭheti, na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 949^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^P4.0292^ea^ sati antarāye, pariyesitvā na labhati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] catutthasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 950^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhaddā kāpilānī sākete vassaṃ upagatā hoti. sā kenacideva karaṇīyena ubbāḷhā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā santike dūtaṃ pāhesi -- ``sace me ayyā thullanandā upassayaṃ dadeyya āgaccheyyāmahaṃ sāvatthi''nti. thullanandā bhikkhunī evamāha -- ``āgacchatu, dassāmī''ti. atha kho bhaddā kāpilānī sāketā sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. thullanandā bhikkhunī bhaddāya kāpilāniyā upassayaṃ adāsi. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī bahussutā hoti bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kātuṃ. bhaddāpi kāpilānī bahussutā {bahussutāyeva (ka0)} hoti bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kātuṃ uḷārasambhāvitā. manussā -- ``ayyā bhaddā kāpilānī bahussutā bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kātuṃ uḷārasambhāvitā''ti bhaddaṃ kāpilāniṃ ^a^T0.0154^ea^ paṭhamaṃ payirupāsitvā pacchā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ payirupāsanti. thullanandā bhikkhunī issāpakatā -- ``imā kira ^a^M0.0384^ea^ appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā yā imā saññattibahulā viññattibahulā viharantī''ti kupitā anattamanā bhaddaṃ kāpilāniṃ upassayā nikkaḍḍhi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ^a^V0.0399^ea^ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā ayyāya bhaddāya kāpilāniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhaddāya kāpilāniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhatīti {nikkaḍḍhīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhaddāya kāpilāniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 951^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 952^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^bhikkhuniyā^eb^ti aññāya bhikkhuniyā. ^b^upassayo^eb^ nāma kavāṭabaddho vuccati. ^b^datvā^eb^ti sayaṃ datvā. ^b^kupitā anattamanā^eb^ti anabhiraddhā āhatacittā khilajātā.

[03]^b^nikkaḍḍheyyā^eb^ti gabbhe ^a^T0.0155^ea^ gahetvā pamukhaṃ nikkaḍḍhati, āpatti pācittiyassa. pamukhe gahetvā bahi nikkaḍḍhati, āpatti ^a^P4.0293^ea^ pācittiyassa. ekena payogena bahukepi dvāre atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03]^b^nikkaḍḍhāpeyyā^eb^ti aññaṃ āṇāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa {ettha ``āpatti dukkaṭassā''ti sabbattha dissati, bhikkhuvibhaṅge pana idisesu āṇattisahagatasikkhāpadesu ``aññaṃ āṇāpeti āpatti pācittiyassā''ti āgatattā tamanuvattitvā visodhitamidaṃ}. sakiṃ āṇattā bahukepi dvāre atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 953^b^.^eb^ upasampannāya upasampannasaññā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya vematikā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhati vā ^a^M0.0385^ea^ nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03]tassā ^a^V0.0400^ea^ parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. akavāṭabaddhā nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. tassā parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannaṃ kavāṭabaddhā vā akavāṭabaddhā vā nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. tassā parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya upasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya anupasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] 954^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^T0.0156^ea^ alajjiniṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, tassā parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, ummattikaṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, tassā parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, bhaṇḍanakārikaṃ kalahakārikaṃ vivādakārikaṃ bhassakārikaṃ saṅghe adhikaraṇakārikaṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, tassā parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, antevāsiniṃ vā saddhivihāriniṃ vā na sammā vattantiṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, tassā parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] pañcamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 955^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī saṃsaṭṭhā viharissati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapīti ^a^M0.0386^ea^? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave ^a^P4.0294^ea^, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā viharissati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ ^a^T0.0157^ea^ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --

[03] 956^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0401^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā -- `māyye, saṃsaṭṭhā vihari gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi. viviccāyye; vivekaññeva bhaginiyā saṅgho vaṇṇetī'ti. evañca {evañca pana (ka0)} sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya. yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce paṭinissajjeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 957^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^saṃsaṭṭhā^eb^ nāma ananulomikena kāyikavācasikena saṃsaṭṭhā.
[03]^b^gahapati^eb^ nāma yo koci agāraṃ ajjhāvasati.
[03]^b^gahapatiputto^eb^ nāma ye keci {yo koci (ka0)} puttabhātaro.
[03]^b^sā bhikkhunī^eb^ti yā sā saṃsaṭṭhā bhikkhunī.

[03]^b^bhikkhunīhī^eb^ti aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā -- ``māyye, saṃsaṭṭhā vihari gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi. viviccāyye; vivekaññeva bhaginiyā saṅgho vaṇṇetī''ti. dutiyampi vattabbā. tatiyampi vattabbā. sace paṭinissajjati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce paṭinissajjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. sutvā na vadanti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. sā bhikkhunī saṅghamajjhampi ākaḍḍhitvā vattabbā -- ``māyye ^a^T0.0158^ea^, saṃsaṭṭhā vihari gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi. viviccāyye; vivekaññevabhaginiyā saṅgho vaṇṇetī''ti. dutiyampi vattabbā. tatiyampi vattabbā. sace paṭinissajjati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce paṭinissajjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. sā bhikkhunī samanubhāsitabbā. evañca pana, bhikkhave, samanubhāsitabbā. byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo --

[03] 958^b^.^eb^ ``suṇātu ^a^M0.0387^ea^ me, ayye, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi ^a^V0.0402^ea^ gahapatiputtenapi. sā taṃ vatthuṃ na paṭinissajjati. yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya. esā ñatti.

[03]``suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi. sā taṃ vatthuṃ na paṭinissajjati. saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya. yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa; yassā nakkhamati, sā bhāseyya.
[03]``dutiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi...pe0... tatiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi...pe0....
[03]``samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya; khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī''ti.
[03]ñattiyā ^a^P4.0295^ea^ dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 959^b^.^eb^ dhammakamme ^a^T0.0159^ea^ dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]adhammakamme dhammakammasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. adhammakamme vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 960^b^.^eb^ anāpatti asamanubhāsantiyā, paṭinissajjantiyā, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] chaṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 961^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0403^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ caranti. dhuttā ^a^M0.0388^ea^ dūsenti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca ^a^T0.0160^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 962^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 963^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^antoraṭṭhe^eb^ti yassa vijite viharati, tassa raṭṭhe.
[03]^b^sāsaṅkaṃ^eb^ nāma tasmiṃ magge corānaṃ niviṭṭhokāso dissati, bhuttokāso dissati, ṭhitokāso dissati, nisinnokāso dissati, nipannokāso dissati.
[03]^b^sappaṭibhayaṃ^eb^ nāma tasmiṃ magge corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā dissanti.
[03]^b^asatthikā^eb^ nāma vinā satthena.
[03]^b^cārikaṃ careyyā^eb^ti kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa. agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 964^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^V0.0404^ea^ satthena saha gacchati, kheme appaṭibhaye gacchati, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] sattamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 965^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0296^ea^ ^a^M0.0389^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ caranti. dhuttā dūsenti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti ^a^T0.0161^ea^ vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 966^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ careyya, pācattiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 967^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^tiroraṭṭhe^eb^ti yassa vijite viharati, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññassa raṭṭhe.
[03]^b^sāsaṅkaṃ^eb^ nāma tasmiṃ magge corānaṃ niviṭṭhokāso dissati, bhuttokāso dissati, ṭhitokāso dissati, nisinnokāso dissati, nipannokāso dissati.
[03]^b^sappaṭibhayaṃ^eb^ nāma tasmiṃ magge corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā dissanti.
[03]^b^asatthikā^eb^ ^a^V0.0405^ea^ nāma vinā satthena.
[03]^b^cārikaṃ careyyā^eb^ti kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare, āpatti pācittiyassa. agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 968^b^.^eb^ anāpatti satthena saha gacchati, kheme appaṭibhaye gacchati ^a^T0.0162^ea^, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] aṭṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 969^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0390^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ caranti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carissanti haritāni tiṇāni ca sammaddantā, ekindriyaṃ jīvaṃ viheṭhentā, bahū khuddake pāṇe saṅghātaṃ āpādentā''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 970^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī antovassaṃ cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 971^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^P4.0297^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^antovassa^eb^nti purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ avasitvā.
[03]^b^cārikaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0406^ea^ ^b^careyyā^eb^ti kukkuṭasampāte gāme ^a^T0.0163^ea^ gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa. agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 972^b^.^eb^ anāpatti sattāhakaraṇīyena gacchati, kenaci ubbāḷhā gacchati, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] navamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 973^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo tattheva rājagahe ^a^M0.0391^ea^ vassaṃ vasanti, tattha hemantaṃ, tattha gimhaṃ. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``āhundarikā bhikkhunīnaṃ disā andhakārā, na imāsaṃ disā pakkhāyantī''ti. assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca -- saṅghasuṭṭhutāya...pe0... saddhammaṭṭhitiyā vinayānuggahāya. evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 974^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṃvuṭṭhā cārikaṃ na pakkameyya antamaso chappañcayojanānipi, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 975^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ ^a^T0.0164^ea^ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^vassaṃvuṭṭhā^eb^ nāma purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ vuṭṭhā.
[03]``cārikaṃ na pakkamissāmi antamaso chappañcayojanānipī''ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 976^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^V0.0407^ea^ sati antarāye, pariyesitvā dutiyikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ na labhati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[06] tuvaṭṭavaggo catuttho.

[03] 977^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0298^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena rañño pasenadissa kosalassa uyyāne cittāgāre paṭibhānacittaṃ kataṃ ^a^M0.0392^ea^ hoti. bahū manussā cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchanti. chabbaggiyāpi bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya agamaṃsu. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ^a^T0.0165^ea^ cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 978^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī rājāgāraṃ vā cittāgāraṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 979^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0408^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^rājāgāraṃ^eb^ nāma yattha katthaci rañño kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hoti.
[03]^b^cittāgāraṃ^eb^ nāma yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hoti.
[03]^b^ārāmo^eb^ nāma yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kato hoti.
[03]^b^uyyānaṃ^eb^ nāma yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hoti.
[03]^b^pokkharaṇī^eb^ nāma yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ katā hoti.

[03] 980^b^.^eb^ dassanāya gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. yattha ṭhitā passati, āpatti pācittiyassa. dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ passati, āpatti pācittiyassa. ekamekaṃ dassanāya gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. yattha ṭhitā passati, āpatti pacittiyassa. dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 981^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^P4.0299^ea^ ^a^M0.0393^ea^ ārāme ṭhitā passati, gacchantī vā āgacchantī vā ^a^T0.0166^ea^ passati, sati karaṇīye gantvā passati, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 982^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo āsandimpi pallaṅkampi paribhuñjanti. manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo āsandimpi pallaṅkampi paribhuñjissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ ^a^V0.0409^ea^. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo āsandimpi pallaṅkampi paribhuñjissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo āsandimpi pallaṅkampi paribhuñjantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo āsandimpi pallaṅkampi paribhuñjissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 983^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā paribhuñjeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 984^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ ^a^T0.0167^ea^ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^āsandī^eb^ nāma atikkantappamāṇā vuccati.
[03]^b^pallaṅko^eb^ nāma āharimehi {``asaṃhārimehi'' iti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyā sameti} vāḷehi kato hoti.
[03]^b^paribhuñjeyyā^eb^ti tasmiṃ abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 985^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^M0.0394^ea^ āsandiyā pāde chinditvā paribhuñjati, pallaṅkassa vāḷe bhinditvā paribhuñjati, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 986^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantanti. manussā ^a^P4.0300^ea^ vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā ^a^V0.0410^ea^ ...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā ^a^T0.0168^ea^ pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 987^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī suttaṃ kanteyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 988^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^suttaṃ^eb^ nāma cha suttāni -- khomaṃ, kappāsikaṃ, koseyyaṃ, kambalaṃ, sāṇaṃ, bhaṅgaṃ.
[03]^b^kanteyyā^eb^ti sayaṃ kantati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ. ujjavujjave āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 989^b^.^eb^ anāpatti kantitasuttaṃ kantati, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] tatiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 990^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0395^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṃ karonti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṃ karissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṃ karontīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṃ karissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 991^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī gihiveyyāvaccaṃ kareyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 992^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^T0.0169^ea^ ^a^V0.0411^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^gihiveyyāvaccaṃ^eb^ nāma agārikassa yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ ^a^P4.0301^ea^ vā pacati, sāṭakaṃ vā veṭhanaṃ vā dhovati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 993^b^.^eb^ anāpatti yāgupāne, saṅghabhatte, cetiyapūjāya, attano veyyāvaccakarassa yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā pacati, sāṭakaṃ vā veṭhanaṃ vā dhovati, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] catutthasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 994^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca -- ``ehāyye, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī''ti. thullanandā bhikkhunī `sādhū'ti paṭissuṇitvā neva vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti. atha kho sā bhikkhunī ^a^M0.0396^ea^ bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā bhikkhuniyā -- `ehāyye', imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī'ti vuccamānā -- `sādhū'ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasamessati na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā -- ``ehāyye, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī''ti vuccamānā -- ``sādhū''ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva ^a^T0.0170^ea^ vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karotīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā -- ``ehāyye, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī''ti vuccamānā -- ``sādhū''ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasamessati na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --

[03] 995^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā -- `ehāyye, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī'ti vuccamānā ^a^V0.0412^ea^ -- `sādhū'ti paṭissuṇitvā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vūpasameyya na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 996^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^bhikkhuniyā^eb^ti aññāya bhikkhuniyā.
[03]^b^adhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇāni -- vivādādhikaraṇaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
[03]^b^ehāyye imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī^eb^ti ehāyye imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchehi.
[03]^b^sā^eb^ ^a^P4.0302^ea^ ^b^pacchā anantarāyikinī^eb^ti asati antarāye.
[03]^b^neva vūpasameyyā^eb^ti na sayaṃ vūpasameyya.
[03]^b^na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ kareyyā^eb^ti na aññaṃ āṇāpeyya. ``neva vūpasamessāmi na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī''ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 997^b^.^eb^ upasampannāya ^a^M0.0397^ea^ upasampannasaññā adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya ^a^T0.0171^ea^ vematikā adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03]anupasampannāya adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya upasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampannāya anupasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 998^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^V0.0413^ea^ sati antarāye, pariyesitvā na labhati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] pañcamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 999^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī naṭānampi naṭakānampi laṅghakānampi sokajjhāyikānampi kumbhathūṇikānampi sahatthā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ deti -- ``mayhaṃ parisati vaṇṇaṃ bhāsathā''ti. naṭāpi naṭakāpi laṅghakāpi sokajjhāyikāpi kumbhathūṇikāpi thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā parisati vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti -- ``ayyā thullanandā bahussutā bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kātuṃ; detha ayyāya, karotha ayyāyā''ti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ^a^T0.0172^ea^ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā agārikassa sahatthā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ dassatīti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī agārikassa sahatthā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ detīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī agārikassa sahatthā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ dassati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1000^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^M0.0398^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1001^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^agāriko^eb^ nāma yo koci agāraṃ ajjhāvasati.
[03]^b^paribbājako^eb^ nāma bhikkhuñca sāmaṇerañca ṭhapetvā yo koci paribbājakasamāpanno.
[03]^b^paribbājikā^eb^ ^a^V0.0414^ea^ nāma bhikkhuniñca sikkhamānañca sāmaṇeriñca ṭhapetvā yā kāci paribbājikasamāpannā.
[03]^b^khādanīyaṃ^eb^ nāma pañca bhojanāni -- udakadantaponaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāma.
[03]^b^bhojanīyaṃ^eb^ nāma pañca bhojanāni -- odano, kummāso, sattu, maccho, maṃsaṃ.
[03]^b^dadeyyā^eb^ti kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā ^a^P4.0303^ea^ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa. udakadantaponaṃ deti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1002^b^.^eb^ anāpatti dāpeti na deti, upanikkhipitvā deti, bāhirālepaṃ ^a^T0.0173^ea^ deti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] chaṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1003^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjati. aññā utuniyo bhikkhuniyo na labhanti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā ^a^M0.0399^ea^ paribhuñjissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjatīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1004^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1005^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0415^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^āvasathacīvaraṃ^eb^ nāma ``utuniyo bhikkhuniyo paribhuñjantū''ti dinnaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^anissajjitvā paribhuñjeyyā^eb^ti dvetisso rattiyo paribhuñjitvā catutthadivase dhovitvā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇeriyā vā anissajjitvā paribhuñjati ^a^T0.0174^ea^, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 1006^b^.^eb^ anissajjite anissajjitasaññā paribhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa. anissajjite vematikā paribhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa. anissajjite nissajjitasaññā paribhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]nissajjite anissajjitasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nissajjite vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nissajjite nissajjitasaññā anāpatti.
[03] 1007^b^.^eb^ anāpatti nissajjitvā paribhuñjati, puna pariyāyena paribhuñjati, aññā utuniyo bhikkhuniyo na honti, acchinnacīvarikāya, naṭṭhacīvarikāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] sattamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1008^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0304^ea^ ^a^M0.0400^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkāmi. tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā āvasatho ḍayhati. bhikkhuniyo evamāhaṃsu -- ``handāyye, bhaṇḍakaṃ nīharāmā''ti. ekaccā evamāhaṃsu -- ``na mayaṃ, ayye, nīharissāma. yaṃ kiñci naṭṭhaṃ sabbaṃ amhe abhiyuñjissatī''ti. thullanandā bhikkhunī punadeva taṃ āvasathaṃ paccāgantvā bhikkhuniyo pucchi -- ``apāyye, bhaṇḍakaṃ nīharitthā''ti? ``na ^a^V0.0416^ea^ mayaṃ, ayye, nīharimhā''ti ^a^T0.0175^ea^. thullanandā bhikkhunī ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo āvasathe ḍayhamāne bhaṇḍakaṃ na nīharissantī''ti! yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamatīti {pakkamīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1009^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkameyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1010^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^āvasatho^eb^ nāma kavāṭabaddho vuccati.

[03]^b^anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkameyyā^eb^ti bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇeriyā vā anissajjitvā parikkhittassa āvasathassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa. aparikkhittassa āvasathassa upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 1011^b^.^eb^ anissajjite anissajjitasaññā pakkamati, āpatti pācittiyassa. anissajjite vematikā pakkamati, āpatti pācittiyassa. anissajjite ^a^T0.0176^ea^ nissajjitasaññā pakkamati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03]akavāṭabaddhaṃ ^a^M0.0401^ea^ anissajjitvā pakkamati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nissajjite anissajjitasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nissajjite vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nissajjite nissajjitasaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 1012^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^P4.0305^ea^ ^a^V0.0417^ea^ nissajjitvā pakkamati, sati antarāye, pariyesitvā na labhati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] aṭṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1013^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇanti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi ^a^T0.0177^ea^ nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1014^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1015^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^tiracchānavijjā^eb^ {tiracchānavijjaṃ (ka0)} nāma yaṃ kiñci bāhirakaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ.
[03]^b^pariyāpuṇeyyā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0402^ea^ padena pariyāpuṇāti, pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa. akkharāya pariyāpuṇāti, akkharakkharāya āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1016^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^V0.0418^ea^ lekhaṃ pariyāpuṇāti, dhāraṇaṃ pariyāpuṇāti, guttatthāya parittaṃ pariyāpuṇāti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] navamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1017^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena ^a^P4.0306^ea^ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ vācenti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ vācessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā ^a^T0.0178^ea^ bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ vācessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ vācentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ vācessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1018^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī tiracchānavijjaṃ vāceyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1019^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^tiracchānavijjā^eb^ {tiracchānavijjaṃ (ka0)} nāma yaṃ kiñci bāhirakaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ.
[03]^b^vāceyyā^eb^ti padena vāceti, pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa. akkharāya vāceti, akkharakkharāya āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1020^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^M0.0403^ea^ ^a^V0.0419^ea^ lekhaṃ vāceti, dhāraṇaṃ vāceti, guttatthāya parittaṃ vāceti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[06] cittāgāravaggo pañcamo.

[03] 1021^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū gāmakāvāse ekacīvarā cīvarakammaṃ karonti. bhikkhuniyo anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisitvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṃsu. bhikkhū ujjhāyanti ^a^T0.0179^ea^ khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03]^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī anāpucchā ārāmaṃ paviseyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]evañcidaṃ ^a^T0.0180^ea^ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.

[03] 1022^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena te bhikkhū tamhā āvāsā pakkamiṃsu. bhikkhuniyo -- ``ayyā pakkantā''ti, ārāmaṃ nāgamaṃsu. atha kho te bhikkhū punadeva taṃ āvāsaṃ paccāgacchiṃsu. bhikkhuniyo -- ``ayyā āgatā''ti, āpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisitvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā ^a^P4.0307^ea^ te bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tā bhikkhuniyo te bhikkhū etadavocuṃ -- ``kissa tumhe, bhaginiyo, ārāmaṃ ^a^V0.0420^ea^ neva sammajjittha na pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpitthāti? bhagavatā, ayyā, sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ {paññattaṃ hoti (ka0)} hoti -- ``na anāpucchā ārāmo pavisitabbo''ti. tena mayaṃ na āgamimhā''ti. bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ...pe0... anujānāmi, bhikkhave, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpucchā ārāmaṃ ^a^M0.0404^ea^ pavisituṃ. evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03]^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ārāmaṃ paviseyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.

[03] 1023^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena te bhikkhū tamhā āvāsā pakkamitvā punadeva taṃ āvāsaṃ paccāgacchiṃsu. bhikkhuniyo -- ``ayyā pakkantā''ti anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisiṃsu. tāsaṃ kukkuccaṃ ahosi -- ``bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ -- `na santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ārāmo pavisitabbo'ti. mayañcamhā santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisimhā. kacci nu kho mayaṃ pācittiyaṃ āpattiṃ āpannā''ti...pe0... bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1024^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā paviseyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1025^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^jānāti^eb^ nāma sāmaṃ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassā ārocenti, te vā ārocenti.
[03]^b^sabhikkhuko^eb^ nāma ārāmo yattha bhikkhū rukkhamūlepi vasanti.

[03]^b^anāpucchā ārāmaṃ paviseyyā^eb^ti bhikkhuṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā ārāmikaṃ vā anāpucchā parikkhittassa ^a^V0.0421^ea^ ārāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa. aparikkhittassa ārāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 1026^b^.^eb^ sabhikkhuke sabhikkhukasaññā santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisati, āpatti pācittiyassa. sabhikkhuke vematikā santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ^a^T0.0181^ea^ ^a^M0.0405^ea^ ārāmaṃ pavisati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. sabhikkhuke abhikkhukasaññā santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisati, anāpatti.
[03]abhikkhuke sabhikkhukasaññā, āpatti ^a^P4.0308^ea^ dukkaṭassa. abhikkhuke vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. abhikkhuke abhikkhukasaññā, anāpatti.

[03] 1027^b^.^eb^ anāpatti santaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpucchā pavisati, asantaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā pavisati, sīsānulokikā gacchati, yattha bhikkhuniyo sannipatitā honti tattha gacchati, ārāmena maggo hoti, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1028^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ. tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upālissa upajjhāyo āyasmā kappitako susāne viharati. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahattarā {mahantatarā (sī0)} bhikkhunī kālaṅkatā hoti. chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo taṃ bhikkhuniṃ nīharitvā āyasmato kappitakassa vihārassa avidūre jhāpetvā thūpaṃ katvā gantvā tasmiṃ thūpe rodanti. atha kho āyasmā kappitako tena saddena ubbāḷho taṃ thūpaṃ bhinditvā pakiresi. chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo -- ``iminā kappitakena amhākaṃ ayyāya thūpo bhinno, handa naṃ ghātemā''ti, mantesuṃ ^a^T0.0182^ea^. aññatarā bhikkhunī āyasmato upālissa etamatthaṃ ārocesi. āyasmā upāli āyasmato kappitakassa etamatthaṃ ārocesi. atha kho āyasmā kappitako vihārā nikkhamitvā nilīno acchi. atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yenāyasmato kappitakassa vihāro tenupasaṅkamiṃsu ^a^V0.0422^ea^; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmato kappitakassa vihāraṃ pāsāṇehi ca leḍḍūhi ca ottharāpetvā, ``mato kappitako''ti pakkamiṃsu.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0406^ea^ kho āyasmā kappitako tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. addasaṃsu kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṃ kappitakaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ. disvāna evamāhaṃsu -- ``ayaṃ kappitako jīvati, ko nu kho amhākaṃ mantaṃ saṃharī''ti? assosuṃ kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo -- ``ayyena kira upālinā amhākaṃ manto saṃhaṭo''ti. tā āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ akkosiṃsu -- ``kathañhi nāma ayaṃ kāsāvaṭo malamajjano nihīnajacco amhākaṃ mantaṃ saṃharissatī''ti! yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti ^a^P4.0309^ea^ -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ayyaṃ upāliṃ akkosissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo upāliṃ akkosantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo upāliṃ akkosissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave ^a^T0.0183^ea^, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1029^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuṃ akkoseyya vā paribhāseyya vā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1030^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^bhikkhu^eb^nti upasampannaṃ. ^b^akkoseyya vā^eb^ti dasahi vā akkosavatthūhi akkosati etesaṃ vā aññatarena, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]^b^paribhāseyya vā^eb^ti bhayaṃ upadaṃseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 1031^b^.^eb^ upasampanne upasampannasaññā akkosati vā paribhāsati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampanne vematikā akkosati vā paribhāsati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampanne anupasampannasaññā akkosati vā paribhāsati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03]anupasampannaṃ ^a^V0.0423^ea^ akkosati vā paribhāsati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampanne upasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampanne vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampanne anupasampannasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1032^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^M0.0407^ea^ atthapurekkhārāya, dhammapurekkhārāya, anusāsanipurekkhārāya, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1033^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0184^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhaṇḍanakārikā hoti kalahakārikā vivādakārikā bhassakārikā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārikā. thullanandā bhikkhunī tassā kamme karīyamāne paṭikkosati. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī gāmakaṃ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena. atha kho bhikkhunisaṅgho -- ``thullanandā bhikkhunī pakkantā''ti caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipi. thullanandā bhikkhunī gāmake taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvā punadeva sāvatthiṃ ^a^P4.0310^ea^ paccāgacchi. caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā āgacchantiyā neva āsanaṃ paññapesi na pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ pādakaṭhalikaṃ upanikkhipi; na paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi na pānīyena āpucchi. thullanandā bhikkhunī caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca -- ``kissa tvaṃ, ayye, mayi āgacchantiyā neva āsanaṃ paññapesi na pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ pādakaṭhalikaṃ upanikkhipi; na paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi na pānīyena āpucchī''ti? ``evañhetaṃ, ayye, hoti yathā taṃ anāthāyā''ti. ``kissa pana tvaṃ, ayye, anāthā''ti? ``imā maṃ, ayye, bhikkhuniyo -- ``ayaṃ anāthā appaññātā, natthi ^a^T0.0185^ea^ imissā kāci pativattā''ti, āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṃsū''ti. thullanandā bhikkhunī -- ``bālā etā abyattā etā netā jānanti kammaṃ vā kammadosaṃ vā kammavipattiṃ vā kammasampattiṃ vā''ti, caṇḍīkatā gaṇaṃ paribhāsi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā caṇḍīkatā gaṇaṃ paribhāsissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī caṇḍīkatā gaṇaṃ paribhāsatīti {paribhāsīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā ^a^V0.0424^ea^ ...pe0...kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī caṇḍīkatā gaṇaṃ ^a^M0.0408^ea^ paribhāsissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1034^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī caṇḍīkatā gaṇaṃ paribhāseyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1035^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^caṇḍīkatā^eb^ nāma kodhanā vuccati.
[03]^b^gaṇo^eb^ nāma bhikkhunisaṅgho vuccati.

[03]^b^paribhāseyyā^eb^ti ``bālā etā abyattā etā netā jānanti kammaṃ vā kammadosaṃ vā kammavipattiṃ vā kammasampattiṃ vā''ti paribhāsati, āpatti pācittiyassa. sambahulā bhikkhuniyo vā ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vā anupasampannaṃ vā paribhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1036^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^T0.0186^ea^ atthapurekkhārāya, dhammapurekkhārāya, anusāsanipurekkhārāya, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] tatiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1037^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññataro brāhmaṇo bhikkhuniyo nimantetvā bhojesi ^a^P4.0311^ea^. bhikkhuniyo bhuttāvī {bhuttāvinī (ka0)} pavāritā ñātikulāni gantvā ekaccā bhuñjiṃsu ekaccā piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya agamaṃsu. atha kho so brāhmaṇo paṭivissake etadavoca -- ``bhikkhuniyo mayā ayyā santappitā, etha tumhepi santappessāmī''ti. te evamāhaṃsu -- ``kiṃ tvaṃ, ayyo, amhe santappessasi! yāpi tayā nimantitā tāpi amhākaṃ gharāni āgantvā ekaccā bhuñjiṃsu ekaccā ^a^V0.0425^ea^ piṇḍapātaṃ ^a^M0.0409^ea^ ādāya agamaṃsū''ti. atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo amhākaṃ ghare bhuñjitvā aññatra bhuñjissanti, na cāhaṃ paṭibalo yāvadatthaṃ dātu''nti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bhuttāvī {bhuttāvinī (ka0)} pavāritā aññatra bhuñjissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhuttāvī pavāritā aññatra bhuñjantīti ^a^T0.0187^ea^? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhuttāvī pavāritā aññatra bhuñjissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1038^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī nimantitā vā pavāritā vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1039^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^nimantitā^eb^ nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantitā.
[03]^b^pavāritā^eb^ nāma asanaṃ paññāyati, bhojanaṃ paññāyati, hatthapāse ṭhitā abhiharati, paṭikkhepo paññāyati.
[03]^b^khādanīyaṃ^eb^ nāma pañca bhojanāni -- yāguṃ yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāma.
[03]^b^bhojanīyaṃ^eb^ nāma pañca bhojanāni -- odano, kummāso, sattu, maccho, maṃsaṃ.
[03]``khādissāmi bhuñjissāmī''ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 1040^b^.^eb^ nimantite ^a^V0.0426^ea^ nimantitasaññā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. nimantite vematikā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ ^a^M0.0410^ea^ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. nimantite animantitasaññā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ ^a^T0.0188^ea^ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassa...pe0....
[03] 1041^b^.^eb^ anāpatti nimantitā appavāritā, yāguṃ pivati, sāmike apaloketvā bhuñjati, yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ sati paccaye paribhuñjati, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] catutthasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1042^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0312^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarissā visikhāya piṇḍāya caramānā yena aññataraṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. atha kho te manussā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ bhojetvā etadavocuṃ -- ``aññāpi, ayye, bhikkhuniyo āgacchantū''ti. atha kho sā bhikkhunī, ``kathañhi nāma {kathaṃ aññā (syā0)} bhikkhuniyo nāgaccheyyu''nti, bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca -- ``amukasmiṃ, ayye, okāse vāḷā sunakhā caṇḍo balibaddo cikkhallo okāso. mā kho tattha agamitthā''ti. aññatarāpi bhikkhunī tassā visikhāya piṇḍāya caramānā yena taṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. atha kho te manussā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ bhojetvā etadavocuṃ -- ``kissa, ayye, bhikkhuniyo na āgacchantī''ti? atha kho sā bhikkhunī tesaṃ manussānaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi. manussā ^a^T0.0189^ea^ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī kulaṃ maccharāyissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī kulaṃ ^a^M0.0411^ea^ maccharāyatīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī kulaṃ ^a^V0.0427^ea^ maccharāyissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1043^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī kulamaccharinī assa, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1044^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^kulaṃ^eb^ nāma cattāri kulāni -- khattiyakulaṃ, brāhmaṇakulaṃ, vessakulaṃ, suddakulaṃ.

[03]^b^maccharinī assā^eb^ti ``kathaṃ bhikkhuniyo nāgaccheyyu''nti bhikkhunīnaṃ santike kulassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti pācittiyassa. kulassa vā santike bhikkhunīnaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1045^b^.^eb^ anāpatti kulaṃ na maccharāyantī santaṃyeva ādīnavaṃ ācikkhati, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] pañcamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1046^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0313^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo gāmakāvāse vassaṃvuṭṭhā sāvatthiṃ agamaṃsu. bhikkhuniyo tā ^a^T0.0190^ea^ bhikkhuniyo etadavocuṃ -- ``katthāyyāyo vassaṃvuṭṭhā? kacci ovādo iddho ahosī''ti? ``natthayye, tattha bhikkhū; kuto ovādo iddho bhavissatī''ti! yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0412^ea^, bhikkhuniyo abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ ^a^V0.0428^ea^ vasissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1047^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vaseyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1048^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03]^b^abhikkhuko^eb^ nāma āvāso na sakkā hoti ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā gantuṃ. ``vassaṃ vasissāmī''ti senāsanaṃ paññapeti pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhapeti pariveṇaṃ sammajjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. saha aruṇuggamanā āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1049^b^.^eb^ anāpatti vassupagatā bhikkhū pakkantā vā honti vibbhantā vā kālaṅkatā vā pakkhasaṅkantā vā, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] chaṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1050^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0191^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo gāmakāvāse vassaṃvuṭṭhā sāvatthiṃ agamaṃsu. bhikkhuniyo tā bhikkhuniyo etadavocuṃ -- ``katthāyyāyo vassaṃvuṭṭhā; kattha {kacci (syā0)} bhikkhusaṅgho pavārito''ti ^a^P4.0314^ea^? ``na mayaṃ, ayye, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāremā''ti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ na pavāressantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ na pavārentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vassaṃvuṭṭhā ^a^M0.0413^ea^ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ na pavāressanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1051^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0429^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī vassaṃvuṭṭhā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāreyya diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1052^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03]^b^vassaṃvuṭṭhā^eb^ nāma purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ vuṭṭhā. ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāressāmi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā''ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte ^a^T0.0192^ea^ āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1053^b^.^eb^ anāpatti sati antarāye, pariyesitvā na labhati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] sattamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1054^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti. bhikkhuniyo chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo etadavocuṃ -- ``ethāyye ovādaṃ gamissāmā''ti. ``yampi mayaṃ, ayye, gaccheyyāma ovādassa kāraṇā, ayyā chabbaggiyā idheva āgantvā amhe ovadantī''ti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ na gacchissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ na gacchantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ ^a^P4.0315^ea^ na gacchissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1055^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^M0.0414^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gaccheyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1056^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0430^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ ^a^T0.0193^ea^ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^ovādo^eb^ nāma aṭṭha garudhammā.
[03]^b^saṃvāso^eb^ nāma ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā. ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gacchissāmīti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1057^b^.^eb^ anāpatti sati antarāye, pariyesitvā dutiyikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ na labhati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] aṭṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1058^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchanti ovādampi na yācanti. bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchissanti ovādampi na yācissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ``uposathampi na pucchanti ovādampi na yācantī''ti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchissanti ovādampi na yācissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1059^b^.^eb^ ^b^``anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā ^a^T0.0194^ea^ -- uposathapucchakañca ovādūpasaṅkamanañca. taṃ atikkāmentiyā pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1060^b^.^eb^ ^b^anvaddhamāsa^eb^nti ^a^M0.0415^ea^ anuposathikaṃ. ^b^uposatho^eb^ nāma dve uposathā -- cātuddasiko ca pannarasiko ca.
[03]^b^ovādo^eb^ ^a^V0.0431^ea^ nāma aṭṭha garudhammā. ``uposathampi na pucchissāmi ovādampi na yācissāmī''ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1061^b^.^eb^ anāpatti sati antarāye, pariyesitvā dutiyikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ na labhati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] navamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1062^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0316^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā bhedāpesi. atha kho so puriso taṃ bhikkhuniṃ dūsetuṃ upakkami. sā vissaramakāsi. bhikkhuniyo upadhāvitvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavocuṃ -- ``kissa tvaṃ, ayye, vissaramakāsī''ti? atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā bhedāpessatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā bhedāpetīti ^a^T0.0195^ea^ {bhedāpesīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā bhedāpessati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --

[03] 1063^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ vā rudhitaṃ vā anapaloketvā saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā bhedāpeyya vā phālāpeyya vā dhovāpeyya vā ālimpāpeyya vā bandhāpeyya vā mocāpeyya vā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1064^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^M0.0416^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03]^b^pasākhaṃ^eb^ nāma adhonābhi ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ. ^b^jāta^eb^nti tattha jātaṃ. ^b^gaṇḍo^eb^ nāma yo koci ^a^V0.0432^ea^ gaṇḍo. ^b^rudhitaṃ^eb^ nāma yaṃ kiñci vaṇaṃ. ^b^anapaloketvā^eb^ti anāpucchā. ^b^saṅgho^eb^ nāma bhikkhunisaṅgho vuccati. ^b^gaṇo^eb^ nāma sambahulā bhikkhuniyo vuccanti. ^b^puriso^eb^ nāma manussapuriso, na yakkho, na peto, na tiracchānagato, viññū paṭibalo dūsetuṃ. ^b^saddhi^eb^nti ekato. ^b^ekenekā^eb^ti puriso ceva hoti bhikkhunī ca.

[03] 1065^b^.^eb^ ``bhindā''ti āṇāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. bhinne āpatti pācittiyassa. ``phālehī''ti āṇāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. phālite āpatti ^a^T0.0196^ea^ pācittiyassa. ``dhovā''ti āṇāpeti ^a^P4.0317^ea^, āpatti dukkaṭassa. dhovite {dhote (syā0)} āpatti pācittiyassa. ``ālimpā''ti āṇāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. litte {ālitte (syā0)} āpatti pācittiyassa. ``bandhāhī''ti āṇāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. baddhe āpatti pācittiyassa. ``mocehī''ti āṇāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. mutte āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 1066^b^.^eb^ anāpatti apaloketvā bhedāpeti vā phālāpeti vā dhovāpeti vā ālimpāpeti vā bandhāpeti vā mocāpeti vā, yā kāci viññū dutiyikā {yā kāci viññū dutiyā (syā0), yo koci viññū dutiyo (ka0)} hoti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[06] ārāmavaggo chaṭṭho.

[03] 1067^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpenti. sā piṇḍāya carati. manussā evamāhaṃsu -- ``dethāyyāya bhikkhaṃ ^a^M0.0417^ea^, garubhārā {garugabbhā (syā0)} ayyā''ti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo ^a^V0.0433^ea^ appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti...pe0... ^a^T0.0197^ea^ saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1068^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1069^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^gabbhinī^eb^ nāma āpannasattā vuccati. ^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti upasampādeyya.

[03]``vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] 1070^b^.^eb^ gabbhiniyā gabbhinisaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. gabbhiniyā vematikā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. gabbhiniyā agabbhinisaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, anāpatti. agabbhiniyā gabbhinisaññā ^a^P4.0318^ea^, āpatti dukkaṭassa. agabbhiniyā vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. agabbhiniyā agabbhinisaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 1071^b^.^eb^ anāpatti gabbhiniṃ agabbhinisaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, agabbhiniṃ agabbhinisaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1072^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0198^ea^ ^a^M0.0418^ea^ ^a^V0.0434^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpenti. sā piṇḍāya carati. manussā evamāhaṃsu -- ``dethāyyāya bhikkhaṃ, sadutiyikā ayyā''ti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1073^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1074^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^pāyantī^eb^ nāma mātā vā hoti {hotu (ka0)} dhāti {dhātī (sī0 syā0)} vā.
[03]^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti upasampādeyya.

[03]``vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne ^a^T0.0199^ea^ upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] 1075^b^.^eb^ pāyantiyā pāyantisaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. pāyantiyā vematikā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. pāyantiyā apāyantisaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, anāpatti. apāyantiyā ^a^V0.0435^ea^ pāyantisaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. apāyantiyā vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. apāyantiyā apāyantisaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 1076^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^M0.0419^ea^ pāyantiṃ apāyantisaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, apāyantiṃ apāyantisaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1077^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpenti. tā bālā honti abyattā na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī''ti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi ^a^T0.0200^ea^ nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti! netaṃ ^a^P4.0319^ea^, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... vigarahitvā...pe0... dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi -- ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sikkhamānāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ dātuṃ. evañca pana, bhikkhave, dātabbā. tāya sikkhamānāya saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo -- ahaṃ, ayye, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya sikkhamānā. saṅghaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ yācāmī''ti. dutiyampi yācitabbā. tatiyampi yācitabbā. byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo --

[03] 1078^b^.^eb^ ``suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya sikkhamānā saṅghaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ yācati. yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ saṅgho ^a^V0.0436^ea^ itthannāmāya sikkhamānāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ dadeyya. esā ñatti.

[03]``suṇātu ^a^M0.0420^ea^ me, ayye, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya sikkhamānā saṅghaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ yācati. saṅgho itthannāmāya sikkhamānāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ deti. yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya sikkhamānāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiyā dānaṃ, sā tuṇhassa; yassā ^a^T0.0201^ea^ nakkhamati, sā bhāseyya.
[03]``dinnā saṅghena itthannāmāya sikkhamānāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammuti. khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī''ti.

[03] 1079^b^.^eb^ sā sikkhamānā ``evaṃ vadehī''ti vattabbā -- ``pāṇātipātā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmi. adinnādānā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmi. abrahmacariyā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmi. musāvādā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmi. surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmi. vikālabhojanā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmī''ti.
[03]atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1080^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1081^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^dve^eb^ ^a^V0.0437^ea^ ^b^vassānī^eb^ti dve saṃvaccharāni. ^b^asikkhitasikkhā^eb^ ^a^P4.0320^ea^ nāma sikkhā vā na dinnā hoti, dinnā vā sikkhā kupitā. ^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti upasampādeyya.

[03]``vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi ^a^T0.0202^ea^ dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] 1082^b^.^eb^ dhammakamme ^a^M0.0421^ea^ dhammakammasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme vematikā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]adhammakamme dhammakammasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. adhammakamme vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1083^b^.^eb^ anāpatti dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] tatiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1084^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpenti. bhikkhuniyo evamāhaṃsu -- ``etha, sikkhamānā, imaṃ jānātha, imaṃ detha, imaṃ āharatha, iminā attho, imaṃ kappiyaṃ karothā''ti. tā evamāhaṃsu -- ``na mayaṃ, ayye, sikkhamānā. bhikkhuniyo maya''nti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu ^a^T0.0203^ea^ sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena ^a^V0.0438^ea^ asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... vigarahitvā...pe0... dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi -- ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dātuṃ. evañca pana, bhikkhave, dātabbā. tāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ ^a^M0.0422^ea^ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo -- ``ahaṃ ^a^P4.0321^ea^, ayye, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā sikkhamānā saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācāmī''ti. dutiyampi yācitabbā. tatiyampi yācitabbā. byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo --

[03] 1085^b^.^eb^ ``suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā sikkhamānā saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācati. yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dadeyya. esā ñatti.
