[03]atha ^a^V0.0445^ea^ kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ^a^T0.0213^ea^ imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1103^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^M0.0429^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1104^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03]^b^paripuṇṇadvādasavassā^eb^ nāma pattadvādasavassā. ^b^gihigatā^eb^ nāma purisantaragatā vuccati. ^b^dve vassānī^eb^ti dve saṃvaccharāni. ^b^sikkhitasikkhā^eb^ nāma chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā. ^b^asammatā^eb^ nāma ñattidutiyena kammena vuṭṭhānasammuti na dinnā hoti. ^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti upasampādeyya.

[03]``vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1105^b^.^eb^ dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme vematikā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]adhammakamme dhammakammasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. adhammakamme vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1106^b^.^eb^ anāpatti paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu ^a^T0.0214^ea^ dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena sammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] sattamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1107^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0446^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggaṇhāti na anuggaṇhāpeti. tā ^a^M0.0430^ea^ bālā honti abyattā; na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggaṇhissati ^a^P4.0325^ea^ na anuggaṇhāpessatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggaṇhāti na anuggaṇhāpetīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggaṇhissati na anuggaṇhāpessati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1108^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggaṇheyya na anuggaṇhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1109^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ ^a^T0.0215^ea^ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^sahajīvinī^eb^ nāma saddhivihārinī vuccati. ^b^vuṭṭhāpetvā^eb^ti upasampādetvā. ^b^dve vassānī^eb^ti dve saṃvaccharāni.
[03]^b^neva anuggaṇheyyā^eb^ti na sayaṃ anuggaṇheyya uddesena paripucchāya ovādena anusāsaniyā.
[03]^b^na anuggaṇhāpeyyā^eb^ti na aññaṃ āṇāpeyya ``dve vassāni neva anuggaṇhissāmi na anuggaṇhāpessāmī''ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1110^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^V0.0447^ea^ sati antarāye, pariyesitvā na labhati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] aṭṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1111^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo vuṭṭhāpitaṃ ^a^M0.0431^ea^ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandhanti. tā bālā honti abyattā; na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandhissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandhantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandhissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca ^a^T0.0216^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1112^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^P4.0326^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandheyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1113^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03]^b^vuṭṭhāpita^eb^nti upasampāditaṃ. ^b^pavattinī^eb^ nāma upajjhāyā vuccati. ^b^dve vassānī^eb^ti dve saṃvaccharāni. ^b^nānubandheyyā^eb^ti na sayaṃ upaṭṭhaheyya. dve vassāni nānubandhissāmīti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1114^b^.^eb^ anāpatti upajjhāyā bālā vā hoti alajjinī vā, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] navamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1115^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0448^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāseti na vūpakāsāpeti. sāmiko aggahesi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāsessati na vūpakāsāpessati, sāmiko aggahesi ^a^M0.0432^ea^! sacāyaṃ bhikkhunī pakkantā assa, na ca sāmiko ^a^T0.0217^ea^ gaṇheyyā''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāseti na vūpakāsāpeti {...si (ka0)}, sāmiko aggahesīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāsessati na vūpakāsāpessati, sāmiko aggahesi! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1116^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāseyya na vūpakāsāpeyya antamaso chappañcayojanānipi, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1117^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03]^b^sahajīvinī^eb^ nāma saddhivihārinī vuccati. ^b^vuṭṭhāpetvā^eb^ti upasampādetvā. ^b^neva^eb^ ^a^P4.0327^ea^ ^b^vūpakāseyyā^eb^ti na sayaṃ vūpakāseyya. ^b^na vūpakāsāpeyyā^eb^ti na aññaṃ āṇāpeyya. ``neva vūpakāsessāmi na vūpakāsāpessāmi antamaso chappañcayojanānipī''ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1118^b^.^eb^ anāpatti sati antarāye, pariyesitvā dutiyikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ na labhati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[06] gabbhinivaggo sattamo.

[03] 1119^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0218^ea^ ^a^V0.0449^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo ūnavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ vuṭṭhāpenti. tā akkhamā honti sītassa uṇhassa ^a^M0.0433^ea^ jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṃ duruttānaṃ durāgatānaṃ vacanapathānaṃ. uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ kharānaṃ kaṭukānaṃ asātānaṃ amanāpānaṃ pāṇaharānaṃ anadhivāsakajātikā honti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo ūnavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ūnavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ vuṭṭhāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ūnavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti! ūnavīsativassā, bhikkhave, kumāribhūtā akkhamā hoti sītassa uṇhassa...pe0... pāṇaharānaṃ anadhivāsakajātikā hoti. vīsativassāva kho, bhikkhave, kumāribhūtā khamā hoti sītassa uṇhassa...pe0... pāṇaharānaṃ adhivāsakajātikā hoti. netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1120^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī ūnavīsativassaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0219^ea^ ^b^kumāribhūtaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1121^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^ūnavīsativassā^eb^ nāma appattavīsativassā. ^b^kumāribhūtā^eb^ nāma sāmaṇerī vuccati. ^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti upasampādeyya.

[03]``vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne ^a^V0.0450^ea^ upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] 1122^b^.^eb^ ūnavīsativassāya ūnavīsativassasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. ūnavīsativassāya vematikā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ūnavīsativassāya paripuṇṇasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, anāpatti. paripuṇṇavīsativassāya ūnavīsativassasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. paripuṇṇavīsativassāya ^a^M0.0434^ea^ vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. paripuṇṇavīsativassāya paripuṇṇasaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 1123^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ūnavīsativassaṃ paripuṇṇasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ paripuṇṇasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1124^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0220^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpenti. tā ^a^P4.0328^ea^ bālā honti abyattā; na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... vigarahitvā...pe0... dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi -- ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhārasavassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ dātuṃ. evañca pana bhikkhave dātabbā. tāya aṭṭhārasavassāya kumāribhūtāya saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo -- ahaṃ, ayye ^a^T0.0221^ea^, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya ^a^V0.0451^ea^ aṭṭhārasavassā kumāribhūtā saṅghaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ yācāmī''ti. dutiyampi yācitabbā. tatiyampi yācitabbā. byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo --

[03] 1125^b^.^eb^ ``suṇātu ^a^M0.0435^ea^ me, ayye, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya aṭṭhārasavassā kumāribhūtā saṅghaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ yācati. yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmāya aṭṭhārasavassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ dadeyya. esā ñatti.

[03]``suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya aṭṭhārasavassā kumāribhūtā saṅghaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ yācati. saṅgho itthannāmāya aṭṭhārasavassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ deti. yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya aṭṭhārasavassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiyā dānaṃ, sā tuṇhassa; yassā nakkhamati, sā bhāseyya.
[03]``dinnā saṅghena itthannāmāya aṭṭhārasavassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammuti. khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī''ti.

[03]sā aṭṭhārasavassā kumāribhūtā evaṃ vadehīti vattabbā -- ``pāṇātipātā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmi...pe0... ^a^T0.0222^ea^ vikālabhojanā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmī''ti.
[03]atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1126^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1127^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03]^b^paripuṇṇavīsativassā^eb^ ^a^V0.0452^ea^ nāma pattavīsativassā. ^b^kumāribhūtā^eb^ nāma sāmaṇerī vuccati. ^b^dve vassānī^eb^ti dve saṃvaccharāni. ^b^asikkhitasikkhā^eb^ nāma sikkhā vā na dinnā hoti, dinnā vā sikkhā kupitā. ^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti upasampādeyya.

[03]``vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti ^a^M0.0436^ea^ gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] 1128^b^.^eb^ dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa ^a^T0.0223^ea^. dhammakamme vematikā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]adhammakamme dhammakammasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. adhammakamme vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1129^b^.^eb^ anāpatti paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1130^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpenti. bhikkhuniyo evamāhaṃsu -- ``etha sikkhamānā, imaṃ jānātha, imaṃ detha, imaṃ āharatha, iminā attho, imaṃ kappiyaṃ karothā''ti. tā evamāhaṃsu -- ``na mayaṃ, ayye, sikkhamānā; bhikkhuniyo maya''nti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena ^a^V0.0453^ea^ asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ^a^T0.0224^ea^ paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0437^ea^, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... vigarahitvā...pe0... dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi -- ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dātuṃ. evañca pana, bhikkhave, dātabbā. tāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo -- ahaṃ, ayye, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇavīsativassā kumāribhūtā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācāmī''ti. dutiyampi yācitabbā. tatiyampi yācitabbā. byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo --

[03] 1131^b^.^eb^ ``suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇavīsativassā kumāribhūtā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācati. yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ saṅgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu ^a^T0.0225^ea^ sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dadeyya. esā ñatti.

[03]``suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇavīsativassā kumāribhūtā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācati. saṅgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ deti. yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiyā dānaṃ, sā tuṇhassa; yassā nakkhamati, sā bhāseyya.

[03]``dinnā ^a^V0.0454^ea^ saṅghena itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammuti. khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī''ti.
[03]atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1132^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^M0.0438^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1133^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^P4.0329^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03]^b^paripuṇṇavīsativassā^eb^ nāma pattavīsativassā. ^b^kumāribhūtā^eb^ nāma sāmaṇerī vuccati. ^b^dve vassānī^eb^ti dve saṃvaccharāni. ^b^sikkhitasikkhā^eb^ nāma chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā ^a^T0.0226^ea^. ^b^asammatā^eb^ nāma ñattidutiyena kammena vuṭṭhānasammuti na dinnā hoti. ^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti upasampādeyya.

[03]``vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1134^b^.^eb^ dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme vematikā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]adhammakamme dhammakammasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. adhammakamme vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1135^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^V0.0455^ea^ paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena sammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] tatiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1136^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo ūnadvādasavassā vuṭṭhāpenti. tā bālā honti abyattā na jānanti ^a^T0.0227^ea^ kappiyaṃ ^a^M0.0439^ea^ vā akappiyaṃ vā. saddhivihāriniyopi bālā honti abyattā; na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo ūnadvādasavassā vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ūnadvādasavassā vuṭṭhāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ūnadvādasavassā vuṭṭhāpessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1137^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī ūnadvādasavassā vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1138^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^ūnadvādasavassā^eb^ nāma appattadvādasavassā.
[03]^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti upasampādeyya.

[03]``vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1139^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^V0.0456^ea^ paripuṇṇadvādasavassā vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] catutthasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1140^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0228^ea^ ^a^P4.0330^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpenti. tā bālā honti abyattā; na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā. saddhivihāriniyopi bālā honti ^a^M0.0440^ea^ abyattā; na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... vigarahitvā...pe0... dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi -- ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ dātuṃ. evañca pana, bhikkhave, dātabbā. tāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo -- ahaṃ, ayye, itthannāmā paripuṇṇadvādasavassā bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ ^a^T0.0229^ea^ yācāmī''ti. dutiyampi yācitabbā. tatiyampi yācitabbā. sā bhikkhunī saṅghena paricchinditabbā -- ``byattāyaṃ bhikkhunī lajjinī''ti. sace bālā ca hoti alajjinī ca, na dātabbā. sace bālā hoti lajjinī, na dātabbā. sace byattā hoti alajjinī, na dātabbā. sace byattā ca hoti lajjinī ca, dātabbā. evañca pana, bhikkhave, dātabbā. byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo --

[03] 1141^b^.^eb^ ``suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmā paripuṇṇadvādasavassā bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ yācati. yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ dadeyya. esā ñatti.

[03]``suṇātu ^a^V0.0457^ea^ me, ayye, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmā paripuṇṇadvādasavassā bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ yācati. saṅgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ deti. yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiyā dānaṃ, sā tuṇhassa; yassā nakkhamati, sā bhāseyya.
[03]``dinnā saṅghena itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammuti. khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī''ti.
[03]atha ^a^M0.0441^ea^ kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --

[03] 1143^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03] 1144^b^.^eb^ dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme vematikā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā vuṭṭhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 1145^b^.^eb^ anāpatti paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena sammatā vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.

[03] 1146^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ^a^T0.0231^ea^ ārāme. tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī ^a^M0.0442^ea^ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ yācati. atha kho bhikkhunisaṅgho caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ paricchinditvā -- ``alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā''ti, vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ na adāsi. caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī `sādhū'ti paṭissuṇi. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhunisaṅgho aññāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ deti. caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti -- ``ahameva nūna bālā, ahameva nūna alajjinī; yaṃ saṅgho aññāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ deti, mayhameva na detī''ti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī -- `alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā'ti vuccamānā `sādhū'ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, `caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī alaṃ tāva te ayye vuṭṭhāpitenā'ti vuccamānā ``sādhū''ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjatīti {āpajjīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī -- ``alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā''ti vuccamānā `sādhū'ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1147^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī -- `alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā'ti vuccamānā `sādhū'ti^eb^ ^a^T0.0232^ea^ ^b^paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1148^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0459^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^alaṃ tāva te ayye vuṭṭhāpitenā^eb^ti alaṃ tāva te, ayye, upasampāditena. `sādhū'ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1149^b^.^eb^ anāpatti pakatiyā chandā dosā mohā bhayā karontaṃ khiyyati, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] chaṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1150^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0332^ea^ ^a^M0.0443^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarā sikkhamānā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā upasampadaṃ yāci. thullanandā bhikkhunī taṃ sikkhamānaṃ -- ``sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpeti na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti. atha kho sā sikkhamānā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā sikkhamānaṃ -- `sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī'ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpessati na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ -- ``sace me tvaṃ, ayye ^a^T0.0233^ea^, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpeti na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karotīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ -- ``sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpessati na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --

[03] 1151^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ -- `sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi, evāhaṃ ^a^V0.0460^ea^ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī'ti vatvā, sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vuṭṭhāpeyya na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1152^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03]^b^sace me tvaṃ ayye cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī^eb^ti evāhaṃ taṃ upasampādessāmi.
[03]^b^sā pacchā anantarāyikinī^eb^ti asati antarāye.
[03]^b^neva vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti na sayaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya.
[03]^b^na^eb^ ^a^M0.0444^ea^ ^b^vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyyā^eb^ti na aññaṃ āṇāpeyya. ``neva vuṭṭhāpessāmi na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī''ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1153^b^.^eb^ anāpatti sati antarāye, pariyesitvā na labhati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] sattamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1154^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0234^ea^ ^a^P4.0333^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarā sikkhamānā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā upasampadaṃ yāci. thullanandā bhikkhunī taṃ sikkhamānaṃ ``sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpeti na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti. atha kho sā sikkhamānā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā sikkhamānaṃ ^a^V0.0461^ea^ -- sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmīti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpessati na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ -- ``sace maṃ tvaṃ ayye dve vassāni anubandhissasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpeti na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karotīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ -- ``sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpessati na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ ^a^T0.0235^ea^ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --

[03] 1155^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ -- `sace maṃ tvaṃ ayye dve vassāni anubandhissasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī'ti vatvā, sā pacchā anantarāyikinī^eb^ ^a^M0.0445^ea^ ^b^neva vuṭṭhāpeyya na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1156^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^sikkhamānā^eb^ nāma dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā.
[03]^b^sace maṃ tvaṃ ayye dve vassāni anubandhissasī^eb^ti dve saṃvaccharāni upaṭṭhahissasi.
[03]^b^evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī^eb^ti evāhaṃ taṃ upasampādessāmi.
[03]^b^sā pacchā anantarāyikinī^eb^ti asati antarāye.
[03]^b^neva vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti na sayaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya.
[03]^b^na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyyā^eb^ti na aññaṃ āṇāpeyya. ``neva vuṭṭhāpessāmi na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī''ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1157^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^V0.0462^ea^ sati antarāye, pariyesitvā na labhati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] aṭṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1158^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ {sokavassaṃ (sī0) sokāvassaṃ (syā0)} caṇḍakāḷiṃ sikkhamānaṃ ^a^T0.0236^ea^ vuṭṭhāpeti. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ {sokavassaṃ (sī0) sokāvassaṃ (syā0)} caṇḍakāḷiṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ {sokavassaṃ (sī0) sokāvassaṃ (syā0)} caṇḍakāḷiṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpetīti {vuṭṭhāpesīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho ^a^M0.0446^ea^ bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ ^a^P4.0334^ea^ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1159^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1160^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^puriso^eb^ nāma pattavīsativasso. ^b^kumārako^eb^ nāma appattavīsativasso. ^b^saṃsaṭṭhā^eb^ nāma ananulomikena kāyikavācasikena saṃsaṭṭhā. ^b^caṇḍī^eb^ nāma kodhanā vuccati.
[03]^b^sokāvāsā^eb^ nāma paresaṃ dukkhaṃ uppādeti, sokaṃ āvisati. ^b^sikkhamānā^eb^ nāma dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā. ^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti upasampādeyya.

[03]``vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti ^a^V0.0463^ea^ gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ ^a^T0.0237^ea^ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa; gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1161^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ajānantī vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] navamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1162^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī mātāpitūhipi sāmikenapi ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti. mātāpitaropi sāmikopi ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ^a^M0.0447^ea^ ayyā thullanandā amhehi ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessatī''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo mātāpitūnampi sāmikassapi ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā mātāpitūhipi sāmikenapi ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī, mātāpitūhipi ^a^T0.0238^ea^ sāmikenapi ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpetīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī mātāpitūhipi sāmikenapi ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1163^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^P4.0335^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī mātāpitūhi vā sāmikena vā ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1164^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03]^b^mātāpitaro^eb^ ^a^V0.0464^ea^ nāma janakā vuccanti. ^b^sāmiko^eb^ nāma yena pariggahitā hoti. ^b^ananuññātā^eb^ti anāpucchā. ^b^sikkhamānā^eb^ nāma dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā. ^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti upasampādeyya.

[03]vuṭṭhāpessāmīti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1165^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ajānantī vuṭṭhāpeti, apaloketvā vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1166^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe. tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī -- ``sikkhamānaṃ ^a^T0.0239^ea^ vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti ^a^M0.0448^ea^ there bhikkhū sannipātetvā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ passitvā -- ``na tāvāhaṃ, ayyā, sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti there bhikkhū uyyojetvā devadattaṃ kokālikaṃ kaṭamodakatissakaṃ khaṇḍadeviyā puttaṃ samuddadattaṃ sannipātetvā sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpetīti {vuṭṭhāpesīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1167^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1168^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0465^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^pārivāsikachandadānenā^eb^ti ^a^P4.0336^ea^ vuṭṭhitāya parisāya. ^b^sikkhamānā^eb^ nāma dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā. ^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti upasampādeyya.

[03]``vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa ^a^T0.0240^ea^. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1169^b^.^eb^ anāpatti avuṭṭhitāya parisāya vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] ekādasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1170^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṃ ^a^M0.0449^ea^ vuṭṭhāpenti, upassayo na sammati. manussā {manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā (sī0)} ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti, upassayo na sammatī''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1171^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1172^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0466^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^anuvassa^eb^nti anusaṃvaccharaṃ. ^b^vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti ^a^T0.0241^ea^ upasampādeyya.

[03]``vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1173^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ekantarikaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dvādasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1174^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpenti. upassayo tatheva na sammati. manussā {manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā (sī0)} tatheva ujjhāyanti ^a^M0.0450^ea^ khiyyanti vipācenti ^a^P4.0337^ea^ -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpessanti! upassayo tatheva na sammatī''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi ^a^T0.0242^ea^ nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1175^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1176^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0467^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^ekaṃ vassa^eb^nti ekaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ. ^b^dve vuṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti dve upasampādeyya.

[03]``dve vuṭṭhāpessāmī''ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā. kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa. gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] 1177^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ekantarikaṃ ekaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] terasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[06] kumārībhūtavaggo aṭṭhamo.

[03] 1178^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhārenti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi ^a^T0.0243^ea^ ^a^M0.0451^ea^ nāma bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhāressantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhārentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā ^a^V0.0468^ea^ bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhāressanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03]^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī chattupāhanaṃ dhāreyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.

[03] 1179^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti. tassā ^a^P4.0338^ea^ vinā chattupāhanaṃ na phāsu hoti...pe0... bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ...pe0... anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānāya bhikkhuniyā chattupāhanaṃ. evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1180^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1181^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^agilānā^eb^ nāma yassā vinā chattupāhanaṃ phāsu hoti.
[03]^b^gilānā^eb^ nāma yassā vinā chattupāhanaṃ ^a^T0.0244^ea^ na phāsu hoti.
[03]^b^chattaṃ^eb^ nāma tīṇi chattāni -- setacchattaṃ, kilañjacchattaṃ, paṇṇacchattaṃ maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhaṃ. ^b^dhāreyyā^eb^ti sakimpi dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 1182^b^.^eb^ agilānā agilānasaññā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa. agilānā vematikā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa. agilānā gilānasaññā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03]chattaṃ ^a^M0.0452^ea^ dhāreti na upāhanaṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa. upāhanaṃ dhāreti na chattaṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa ^a^V0.0469^ea^. gilānā agilānasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. gilānā vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. gilānā gilānasaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 1183^b^.^eb^ anāpatti gilānāya, ārāme ārāmūpacāre dhāreti, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1184^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyanti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0 ^a^T0.0245^ea^... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03]^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^P4.0339^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī yānena yāyeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.

[03] 1185^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti, na sakkoti padasā gantuṃ...pe0... bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ...pe0... anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānāya bhikkhuniyā yānaṃ. evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1186^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^M0.0453^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī agilānā yānena yāyeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1187^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0470^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^agilānā^eb^ nāma sakkoti padasā gantuṃ.
[03]^b^gilānā^eb^ nāma na sakkoti padasā gantuṃ.
[03]^b^yānaṃ^eb^ nāma vayhaṃ ratho sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā sivikā pāṭaṅkī.
[03]^b^yāyeyyā^eb^ti sakimpi yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1188^b^.^eb^ agilānā agilānasaññā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa. agilānā vematikā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa ^a^T0.0246^ea^. agilānā gilānasaññā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]gilānā agilānasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. gilānā vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. gilānā gilānasaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 1189^b^.^eb^ anāpatti gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1190^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī aññatarissā itthiyā kulūpikā hoti. atha kho sā itthī taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca -- ``handāyye, imaṃ saṅghāṇiṃ amukāya nāma itthiyā dehī''ti. atha kho sā bhikkhunī -- ``sacāhaṃ pattena ādāya gacchāmi vissaro me bhavissatī''ti paṭimuñcitvā agamāsi. tassā rathikāya suttake chinne vippakiriyiṃsu. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi ^a^M0.0454^ea^ nāma bhikkhuniyo saṅghāṇiṃ ^a^V0.0471^ea^ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0 ^a^P4.0340^ea^... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī saṅghāṇiṃ dhāressatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ^a^T0.0247^ea^ saṅghāṇiṃ dhāretī''ti {dhāresīti (ka0)}? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī saṅghāṇiṃ dhāressati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1191^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghāṇiṃ dhāreyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1192^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^saṅghāṇi^eb^ nāma yā kāci kaṭūpagā.
[03]^b^dhāreyyā^eb^ti sakimpi dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1193^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ābādhappaccayā, kaṭisuttakaṃ dhāreti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] tatiyasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1194^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhārenti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāressantī''ti ^a^V0.0472^ea^ ...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhārentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi ^a^T0.0248^ea^ nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ ^a^M0.0455^ea^ dhāressanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1195^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāreyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1196^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^itthālaṅkāro^eb^ nāma sīsūpago gīvūpago hatthūpago pādūpago kaṭūpago. ^b^dhāreyyā^eb^ti sakimpi dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1197^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ābādhapaccayā, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] catutthasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1198^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0341^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyanti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ^a^T0.0249^ea^ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1199^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0473^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1200^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^gandho^eb^ ^a^M0.0456^ea^ nāma yo koci gandho. ^b^vaṇṇakaṃ^eb^ nāma yaṃ kiñci vaṇṇakaṃ. ^b^nahāyeyyā^eb^ti nahāyati. payoge dukkaṭaṃ, nahānapariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1201^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ābādhappaccayā, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] pañcamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1202^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyanti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti ^a^T0.0250^ea^ vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1203^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī vāsitakena piññākena nahāyeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1204^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^vāsitakaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0474^ea^ nāma yaṃ kiñci gandhavāsitakaṃ. ^b^piññākaṃ^eb^ nāma tilapiṭṭhaṃ vuccati. ^b^nahāyeyyā^eb^ti nahāyati. payoge dukkaṭaṃ, nahānapariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1205^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^M0.0457^ea^ ābādhappaccayā, pakatipiññākena nahāyati, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] chaṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1206^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0342^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ^a^T0.0251^ea^ ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi. manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1207^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1208^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^bhikkhuniyā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0475^ea^ aññāya bhikkhuniyā. ^b^ummaddāpeyya vā^eb^ti ummaddāpeti {ubbaṭṭāpeti (sī0)}, āpatti pācittiyassa. ^b^parimaddāpeyya vā^eb^ti sambāhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1209^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^M0.0458^ea^ gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] sattamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1210^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0252^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo sikkhamānāya ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi...pe0... sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi...pe0... gihiniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi. manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma ^a^P4.0343^ea^ bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipīti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1211^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī (sikkhamānāya...pe0... sāmaṇeriyā...pe0...) gihiniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1212^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ ^a^T0.0253^ea^ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^sikkhamānā^eb^ nāma dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā.
[03]^b^sāmaṇerī^eb^ ^a^V0.0476^ea^ nāma dasasikkhāpadikā.
[03]^b^gihinī^eb^ nāma agārinī vuccati.
[03]^b^ummaddāpeyya^eb^ ^a^M0.0459^ea^ ^b^vā^eb^ti ummaddāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]^b^parimaddāpeyya vā^eb^ti sambāhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1213^b^.^eb^ anāpatti gilānāya {ābādhappaccayā (ka0)}, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] aṭṭhama navama dasamasikkhāpadāni niṭṭhitāni.

[03] 1214^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdanti. bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1215^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdeyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1216^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^T0.0254^ea^ panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^bhikkhussa^eb^ ^a^V0.0477^ea^ ^b^purato^eb^ti upasampannassa purato. ^b^anāpucchā^eb^ti anapaloketvā. ^b^āsane nisīdeyyā^eb^ti antamaso chamāyapi nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 1217^b^.^eb^ anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa. anāpucchite vematikā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa ^a^M0.0460^ea^. anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā ^a^P4.0344^ea^ āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]āpucchite anāpucchitasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. āpucchite vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. āpucchite āpucchitasaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 1218^b^.^eb^ anāpatti āpucchā āsane nisīdati, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] ekādasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1219^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchanti. bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ ^a^T0.0255^ea^ pucchantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1220^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ puccheyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1221^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.

[03]^b^anokāsakata^eb^nti ^a^V0.0478^ea^ anāpucchā. ^b^bhikkhu^eb^nti upasampannaṃ. ^b^pañhaṃ puccheyyā^eb^ti suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā vinayaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa. vinaye okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa. abhidhamme okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] 1222^b^.^eb^ anāpucchite ^a^M0.0461^ea^ anāpucchitasaññā pañhaṃ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa. anāpucchite vematikā pañhaṃ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa. anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā pañhaṃ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03]āpucchite anāpucchitasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. āpucchite vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. āpucchite āpucchitasaññā, anāpatti.
[03] 1223^b^.^eb^ anāpatti okāsaṃ kārāpetvā pucchati, anodissa okāsaṃ kārāpetvā yattha katthaci pucchati, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] dvādasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1224^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0256^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena ^a^P4.0345^ea^ aññatarā bhikkhunī asaṅkaccikā {asaṅkacchikā (syā0)} gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. tassā rathikāya vātamaṇḍalikā saṅghāṭiyo ukkhipiṃsu. manussā ukkuṭṭhiṃ akaṃsu -- ``sundarā ayyāya thanudarā''ti. sā bhikkhunī tehi manussehi uppaṇḍiyamānā maṅku ahosi. atha kho sā bhikkhunī upassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī asaṅkaccikā gāmaṃ pavisissatī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī asaṅkaccikā gāmaṃ pāvisīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī asaṅkaccikā gāmaṃ pavisissati! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1225^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā^eb^ ^a^V0.0479^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhunī asaṅkaccikā^eb^ {asaṅkacchikā (syā0)} ^b^gāmaṃ paviseyya, pācittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 1226^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^M0.0462^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^asaṅkaccikā^eb^ti vinā saṅkaccikaṃ.
[03]^b^saṅkaccikaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0257^ea^ nāma adhakkhakaṃ ubbhanābhi, tassa paṭicchādanatthāya.
[03]^b^gāmaṃ paviseyyā^eb^ti parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa. aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] 1227^b^.^eb^ anāpatti acchinnacīvarikāya, naṭṭhacīvarikāya, gilānāya, assatiyā, ajānantiyā, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] terasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[06] chattupāhanavaggo navamo.

[03]uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, chasaṭṭhisatā pācittiyā dhammā. tatthāyyāyo pucchāmi -- ``kaccittha parisuddhā''? dutiyampi pucchāmi -- ``kaccittha parisuddhā''? tatiyampi pucchāmi -- ``kaccittha parisuddhā''? parisuddhetthāyyāyo, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
[06] khuddakaṃ samattaṃ.
[06] bhikkhunivibhaṅge pācittiyakaṇḍaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[06] ime kho panāyyāyo aṭṭha pāṭidesanīyā
[06] dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.

[03] 1228^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0258^ea^ ^a^M0.0463^ea^ ^a^P4.0346^ea^ ^a^V0.0480^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti! kassa sampannaṃ na manāpaṃ, kassa sāduṃ na ruccatī''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjissantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā, bhikkhuniyo sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03]^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā -- `gārayhaṃ, ayye, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī'''^eb^ti.
[03]evañcidaṃ bhagavatā ^a^T0.0259^ea^ bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.

[03] 1229^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0481^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gilānā honti. gilānapucchikā bhikkhuniyo gilānā bhikkhuniyo etadavocuṃ -- ``kacci, ayye, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīya''nti? ``pubbe mayaṃ, ayye, sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjāma, ^a^M0.0464^ea^ tena no phāsu hoti; idāni pana ``bhagavatā paṭikkhitta''nti kukkuccāyantā na viññāpema, tena no na phāsu hotī''ti...pe0... bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ...pe0... anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānāya bhikkhuniyā sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjituṃ ^a^P4.0347^ea^. evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03] 1230^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā -- `gārayhaṃ, ayye, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ taṃ paṭidesemī'''^eb^ti.
[03] 1231^b^.^eb^ ^b^yā panā^eb^ti yā yādisā...pe0... ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ti...pe0... ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
[03]^b^agilānā^eb^ nāma yassā vinā sappinā phāsu hoti.
[03]^b^gilānā^eb^ nāma yassā vinā sappinā na phāsu hoti.
[03]^b^sappi^eb^ nāma gosappi vā ajikāsappi vā mahiṃsasappi vā. yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati tesaṃ sappi.
[03]agilānā attano atthāya viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ. paṭilābhena ``bhuñjissāmī''ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ajjhohāre ajjhohāre ^a^T0.0260^ea^ āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.

[03] 1232^b^.^eb^ agilānā agilānasaññā sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa. agilānā vematikā sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa. agilānā gilānasaññā sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
[03]gilānā ^a^V0.0482^ea^ agilānasaññā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. gilānā vematikā, āpatti dukkaṭassa. gilānā gilānasaññā, anāpatti.

[03] 1233^b^.^eb^ anāpatti ^a^M0.0465^ea^ gilānāya, gilānā hutvā viññāpetvā agilānā bhuñjati, gilānāya sesakaṃ bhuñjati, ñātakānaṃ pavāritānaṃ, aññassatthāya, attano dhanena, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.

[03] 1240^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0264^ea^ ^a^M0.0468^ea^ ^a^P4.0349^ea^ ^a^V0.0485^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsenti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā...pe0... tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessantī''ti...pe0... saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsentīti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03]^b^``parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā''^eb^ti.
[03]parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ nābhimaṇḍalaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentiyā. yā anādariyaṃ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambentī ^a^T0.0265^ea^ nivāseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03]anāpatti ^a^V0.0486^ea^ asañcicca, assatiyā, ajānantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti...pe0... (saṃkhittaṃ).

[03] 1241^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karonti. manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi ^a^M0.0469^ea^ passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo''ti! assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ. yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā, tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti -- ``kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ^a^P4.0350^ea^ udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissantī''ti! atha kho bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. bhikkhū {ye te bhikkhū...pe0... (?)} bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. atha kho bhagavā...pe0... bhikkhū paṭipucchi -- ``saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karontī''ti? ``saccaṃ, bhagavā''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā...pe0... kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti! netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya...pe0... evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03]^b^``na udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā''^eb^ti ^a^T0.0266^ea^.

[03]tena kho pana samayena gilānā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ kukkuccāyanti. bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ...pe0... anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānāya bhikkhuniyā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ. evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu --
[03]^b^``na udake agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā''^eb^ti.
[03]na ^a^V0.0487^ea^ udake agilānāya uccāro vā passāvo vā kheḷo vā kātabbo. yā anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03]anāpatti asañcicca, assatiyā, ajānantiyā, gilānāya, thale kato udakaṃ ottharati, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, khittacittāya, vedanāṭṭāya, ādikammikāyāti.
[06] pannarasamasikkhāpadaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[06] pādukavaggo sattamo.

[03]uddiṭṭhā ^a^M0.0470^ea^ kho, ayyāyo, sekhiyā dhammā. tatthāyyāyo pucchāmi -- ``kaccittha parisuddhā''? dutiyampi pucchāmi -- ``kaccittha parisuddhā''? tatiyampi pucchāmi -- ``kaccittha parisuddhā''? parisuddhetthāyyāyo, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
[06] sekhiyakaṇḍaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[06] ime kho panāyyāyo satta adhikaraṇasamathā
[06] dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.

[03] 1242^b^.^eb^ uppannuppannānaṃ ^a^T0.0267^ea^ ^a^P4.0351^ea^ ^a^V0.0488^ea^ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo, sativinayo dātabbo, amūḷhavinayo dātabbo, paṭiññāya kāretabbaṃ, yebhuyyasikā, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇavatthārakoti.

[03]uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā. tatthāyyāyo pucchāmi -- ``kaccittha parisuddhā''? dutiyampi pucchāmi -- ``kaccittha parisuddhā''? tatiyampi pucchāmi -- ``kaccittha parisuddhā''? parisuddhetthāyyāyo, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
[06] adhikaraṇasamathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]uddiṭṭhaṃ kho, ayyāyo, nidānaṃ. uddiṭṭhā aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā. uddiṭṭhā sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā. uddiṭṭhā tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā. uddiṭṭhā chasaṭṭhisatā pācittiyā dhammā. uddiṭṭhā aṭṭha pāṭidesanīyā dhammā. uddiṭṭhā sekhiyā dhammā. uddiṭṭhā satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā. ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchati. tattha sabbāheva samaggāhi sammodamānāhi avivadamānāhi sikkhitabbanti.
[06] bhikkhunivibhaṅgo niṭṭhito.
[06] pācittiyapāḷi niṭṭhitā.
